NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM military convoy heading to Wanlaweyn town near K50 Airstrip in the afternoon of 17/11. AS fighters started the ambush by firing RPGs at the convoy before the two sides exchanged gunfire briefly. Unconfirmed reports indicate that an AMISOM military truck was destroyed in the clash. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Armed clashes breakout after al Shabaab militants storm AMISOM locations in Kismayo. The attacks occurred overnight and into the second day. Witnesses confirm causalities, though specific numbers are currently unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Day two of a deries of al Shabaab attacks on Kismayo.

ACTOR1: Al Shabaab
ASSOC_ACTOR_2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces ambush a Somali forces convoy. AMISOM forces were in the area and were able to fight off the assailants. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Shabaab fighters attacked a group of AMISOM/Somali forces at a location known as Ceelasha Biyaha. Causality numbers could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Members of the 'Cukash' militia and Somali forces clashed after the militia took control of a checkpoint normally manned by the army before the army arrived. The army took over control of the checkpoint after a brief exchange of gunfire with the militias. One militiaman was killed. AMISOM troops later arrived to the area to ease the tension.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Shabaab fighters attacked a group of AMISOM soldiers. The resulting battle lasted 30 minutes. Casualties unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab clashes with allied forces near Buurdhuubo. Several al Shabaab training camps were destroyed in the battle. Causality list not provided.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Militants and Kenyan forces clash outside Kismayo following an attack from al Shabaab. Al Shabaab claims they caused 40 Kenyan deaths, but this claim was not substantiated by Nairobi.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A landmine explosion hits an AMISOM convoy in Marka. Somali government minister were also present. Following the attack the soldiers responded with indiscriminate gunfire. Witnesses say to have seen many injured or dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militias launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG positions in Bangalo area (Dayniile District) in the night of 04-05/12. The clash that involved the use of RPG rounds lasted for around 20mn. One SNG soldier was injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and Somali forces clash with al Shabaab clash in Jowhar, 13 militants reported dead, three captured alive.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a hand grenade against soldiers stationed in Bar Ubah Junction (Hawl-Wadaag District) in the evening of 08/12. The soldiers fired back in the direction of the attackers. No casualties were reported. The perpetrators escaped from the scene.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Shabaab militias launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in K50 in the night of 09/12. The attack started with an exchange of mortar fire. The clash lasted for around one hour. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and national forces capture the town of Jowhar from al Shabaab after little resistance. No report of causality.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab forces conducted a series of hit-and-run attacks against several Somali and Burundian positions during the late evening. Fighting in some places lasted up to an hour. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab units conduct a series of three hit-and-run attacks on AMISOM and national forces in Ceelasha Biyaha. Causalities are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al-Shabaab forces reportedly attack and kill ten Kenyan soldiers near Kismaayo university. Somali national forces were present, but did not report any causalities.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al-Shabaab militia attack a Kenyan (AMISOM) position in southern Somalia. Causalities unknown. (Radio al-Furqaan is pro-al Shabaab)

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a night time attack on AMISOM (Kenya) bases outside Kismayo causing ten unconfirmed AMISOM deaths and 20 more injuries.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An al Shabaab propaganda source reports the militias have made two ambushes of AMISOM (Kenyan) forces between Tabta and Bilis Qooqaani. Causalities unknown. This event is unconfirmed by AMISOM.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces recapture Buulo Gaduud town from Somali forces. The two sides clashed inside the town resulting in the withdrawal of government and AMISOM forces. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked Somali/AMISOM troops in Calamada area on the Mogadishu-Afgooye Road in the evening of 01/01. The fighting lasted for about 40 minutes after which the al Shabaab forces withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM soldiers kill a al Shabaab commander, Mohamed Abu, during a raid on his location (unnamed) 70 kilometres from Mogadishu. The deceased was the commander of 50 al Shabaab militias operating between Bay and Lower Shabelle regions.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Ugandan AMISOM forces overrun and inflict 'heavy losses' at a al Shabaab headquarters between Leego and Balidoogle.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: At least one person was killed and three others injured after unidentified assailants hurled a hand grenade at the home of a senior government official. The attack prompted an exchange of gunfire between the attackers and AMISOM security.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked an AMISOM/Somali outpost in Buufow Bacaad village in Marka District on 07/01. The two sides reportedly exchanged heavy gunfire and RPG rounds for about an hour before the al Shabaab attackers retreated. No causality report.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A pro-al Shabaab news source claims Shabaab shelled a AMISOM base in Bilaal neighbourhood in Marka town in the night of 07/01, despite Ugandan forces gaining control of the town earlier in the day. Following the initial attack there was an exchange of gunfire, 8 AMISOM soldiers killed. These claims have not been substantiated by independent sources.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Three Somali soldiers were injured in Mogadishu after unidentified gunmen attacked a convoy of government and African Union troops in the capitals Yaaqshid District.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: At least two people have been killed while four others were injured as government troops backed by Amisom forces clashed against Al-Shabab forces in Buufow locality.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: A group of al Shabaab fighters attacked an AMISOM/Somali position in Kaba Hirig (a former military camp) in Wanlaweyne District in the night of 09/01. The attackers withdrew after a 25-minute fire fight. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: A IED targeted an AMISOM military convoy near Ayuubka School in Horseed neighbourhood in Marka in the morning of 13/01. The soldiers reportedly opened indiscriminate fire after the blast. Casualties resulting from the blast and the gunfire could not be established. Following the attack Somali forces conducted a security sweep and made several arrests of suspects.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: A pro-al Shabaab website published a report that Shabaab fighters fired artillery guns at the presidential palace in Kismaayo in the night of 14/01. The website stated that Kenyan and anti-al Shabaab military officers were having a meeting at the time of the attack. One Kenya soldier was reportedly killed in the attack. This report could not be independently verified.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Government/AMISOM troops and anti-al Shabaab forces are reported to be making new movements on the road between Leego and Buur Hakaba on 15/01. Unconfirmed reports suggest the allied forces reached an area known as Jiira Kuulow, between Leego and Buur Hakaba, where they clashed with al Shabaab fighters. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces conducted several attacks against AMISOM/Somali forces in an area between Shalaamboot and Ceel-Axmed. At least one of the clashes was in a location known as Ceel Jeelle. Causalities not established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Kenyan forces clashed against Al-Shabab fighters in the southern city of Kismaayo. The fighting, which erupted after Al-Shabab fighters attacked Kenyan army base in the city, resulted in deaths and injuries, though numbers were not provided.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: A pro-Shabaab news source claims an attack on AMISOM and government bases in the Dayniile district. Causality list not provided.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked a group of AMISOM forces the evening of 25/01. The two sides exchanged fire briefly before the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: The civilians are killed during a clash between al Shabaab and government forces backed by AMISOM. The clash began after a Djibouti (AMISOM) position was attacked.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Ethiopia (1991-2018)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit-and-run attack against pro-Somali government and Ethiopian forces in Xudur on the evening of 01/02. The ENDF responded with heavy gunfire forcing the al Shabaab to withdraw. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Government and AMISOM forces overtake Luq-Jelow and Baar settlements, some 30 km from Beled Weyne after and attack by al Shabaab the previous day. A military source confirmed the settlements capture. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Government and AMISOM forces overtake Luq-Jelow and Baar settlements, some 30 km from Beled Weyne after and attack by al Shabaab the previous day. A military source confirmed the settlements capture. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Pro-Somali government forces and al Shabaab militias clashed in Aboore village (20km N of Xudur) in the morning of 03/01. One al Shabaab militiaman was reportedly killed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unconfirmed report of two AMISOM deaths during battle with al Shabaab in Mogadishu. Exact date and location unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and run attack against government/AMISOM forces based in Xero Jerman in Wardhiigley District in the night of 07/02. The fighting lasted for about 30 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces launched a surprise attack on an al Shabaab position and are able to dismantle it. Four AK-47 rifles and several vehicles were recovered. The militants suffered 'many causalities.'

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM soldiers encounter and kill two members of al Shabaab along the main road between Mudale and Busaar. Several al Shabaab fighters escaped, but are reportedly in need of medical attention. Exact date unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: At least two people were killed and four others injured following heavy fighting between government troops backed by Amisom (African Unions Mission in Somalia) against Al-Shabab fighters in Baydhaabo (Baidoa) town. Exact date unclear.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and government forces launched an offensive against al Shabaab positions in Janaale, capture the village. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against government/AMISOM forces based in Shalaambood in the afternoon of 13/02. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab claimed to have executed a captured Kenyan private after their demands that all Kenyan forces leave Somalia were not met. The execution was not substantiated by independent sources. The exact location of the execution is unknown; AMISOM-Kenya operates in Jubada Hoose and Jubbada Dhexe. The following day the group threatened to kill five remaining hostages if their demands were not met.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Government forces, backed by AMISOM, liberate four unnamed towns in Lower Shabelle region from al Shabaab. Names and specific dates unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and government forces launched an offensive against al Shabaab positions in Bariira, capture the village. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and government forces launched an offensive against al Shabaab positions in Awdheegle, capture the village. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and government forces capture Jowhar Airfield (20km from Jowhar) from al Shabaab. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: A small reconnaissance unit of AMISOM and Somali forces overtake two al Shabaab controlled villages with very little if any resistance.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: A small reconnaissance unit of AMISOM and Somali forces overtake two al Shabaab controlled villages with very little if any resistance.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Heavy fighting in the southern Somali town of Janaale between government forces and Al-Shabab has left eight people dead and many more wounded. Government forces had taken the town from al Shabaab less than a week earlier. Al Shabaab forces withdrew after about 45 minutes of fighting. Al Shabaab propaganda claims 25 AMISOM/government soldiers were killed in the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Somali government forces with the support of African Union Mission in Somalia (AMISOM) have captured the towns of Dardan and Jirada-Kullow in Bay region in simultaneous dawn operations. Causalities unreported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM and al Shabaab clash outside of Leego in a location known as Lidow Jalaad resulting in unconfirmed losses on both sides.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Government and AMISOM forces capture a logistically important bridge outside of Buurhakaba from al Shabaab. No al Shabaab resistance reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and government forces overtake the town of Buurhakaba from al Shabaab. Many of the militants fled during the attack. Causalities unreported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: At least three people were killed and five others injured after Somali government troops backed by African Union forces clashed with Al-Shabab fighters in Aw-dinle village in the south-western Bay Region.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A senior Al-Shabaab leader Shaykh Mukhtar 'Abu-Mansur' Robow Ali has been wounded in a battle between the sect and AMISOM near Buurhakaba.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers lobbed two hand grenades simultaneously at the AMISOM camp located in the former Jalle Siyaad Military Academy (Hodan District) in the evening of 04/03. The soldiers at the camp opened fire in the direction of the attackers who managed to escape from the scene. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/Somali troops launched a coordinated attack against al Shabaab strong holds in Wagaade and Mushaani, 7 and 8km southwest of Janaale and were able to take control of the villages. Sources report four members of al Shabaab were killed in the attack, while several others were injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked Somali/AMISOM positions in Janaale in the night of 28/03. The fighting lasted for about 30 minutes. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked Somali/AMISOM forces near Shalanbood in the evening of 30/03. Al Shabaab celebrated the attack on their Twitter account claiming to had killed five soldiers. AMISOM on the other hand claimed to had killed a senior al Shabaab

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab and Somali/AMISOM forces clashed in Arbiska in the evening of 30/03. Al Shabaab claimed to had killed seven Somali/AMISOM soldiers during the fighting, though this claim could not be independently verified. Details of the attack were gathered from al Shabaabs twitter account.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab carried out a hit-and-run attack against SNG/AMISOM forces in K60 area in Afgooye District in the night of 01/04. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire that lasted for about 40 minutes, after which the attackers withdrew. Six combatants were reportedly killed in the clash.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit-and-run attack on an AMISOM (Burundian) base located in El-Haji village, 5 km west of Marka town. The two sides exchanged light and heavy weapons, including RPG rounds in a battle that lasted about 15 minutes. The casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Somali Memo reports al Shabaab attacked a AMISOM base in Marka, bringing 'death and injuries on the enemy.' The Somali Memo is pro-al Shabaab, and the attack was not confirmed by AMISOM.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Somali Memo reports al Shabaab attack AMISOM forces at KM60 village outside of Marka, inflicting 'human and material losses.' This claim has not been substantiated by AMISOM commanders.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: During a news conference a al Shabaab leader claimed to have conducted a attack on AMISOM Kenyan soldiers as they gathered water in Afmadow. Seven dead and a military truck destroyed. The deaths were later confirmed - the Somali Memo is pro-al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushed ad military convoy near Dhobley town in the afternoon of 13/04. The two sides engaged in a serious gunfire that lasted for an hour before al Shabaab withdrew. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Al Shabaab conducted a hit-and-run attack against anti-al Shabaab/AMISOM position in Afmadow in the evening of 13/04. Three al Shabaab fighters and four government-allied soldiers were reportedly killed in the clash.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushed a KDF (AMISOM) convoy travelling to Bilis Qooqaani, 50 km south west of Afmadow, at Galaf village (40km south of Bilis Qooqaani), on 17/04. An RPG round fired by al Shabaab slightly damaged a KDF truck. No other casualties were reported. Al Shabaab fighters left the area after a brief gun battle.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An AMISOM convoy transporting logistics, a supply from Dobley to Hoosingo, was attacked by al Shabaab, at about midday. A thirty minute exchange ensued during which six al Shabaab were killed and one AMISOM soldier was slightly wounded.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Somali and AMISOM forces dismantle a recently set up al Shabaab surveillance post near Kismayo International Airport, several al Shabaab killed in the raid. Exact numbers unreported. The evening raid also yielded several arrests.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Pro-government forces attacked an al Shabaab position in Ceel Garas village (36km E of Xudur) in the morning of 29/04. Three al Shabaab fighters were reportedly killed during the clash. Pro-government forces reportedly looted business premises in the village before retreating to their base in Ceel Barde.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attack Kismayos airport over the course of three days, 30/04 , 01/05 and 02/05 with light and heavy weapons. Six reported dead over the course of the attack. No report of return fire, though the event is described as a 'battle.' AMISOM air forces were deployed to the area in response.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Forces allied to the government attack an al Shabaab position in Ilyoow-Kooyow village (30km E of Xudur District) on 30/04. Two al Shabaab fighters were reportedly killed while the rest fled the village.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked pro-government militias in Ceel Gaal village (20km N of Beled Weyne) in the evening of 30/04. The al Shabaab fighters took over control of the village after the small number of the pro-government militias retreated.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack an AMISOM position in the evening of 30/04. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters in Lower Shabelle Region launched a hit-and-run attack on AMISOM and Somali troop positions in Janaale village on 30/04. The clashes started with RPGs and small arms fired by al Shabaab fighters at the allied forces outposts. The two sides exchanged gunfire for a few minutes before the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported from the clashes.

ACTOR1: Raskamboni Brigade
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Raskamboni (RKB) and clan militias hailing from Gaal Jecel clashed in Calanley neighbourhood in Kismaayo in the evening of 01/05 following a dispute over the arrest of an al Shabaab suspect. Reports indicate that Gaal Jecel militias ambushed the RKB and KDF(AMISOM) convoy transporting the suspect who hails from Gacal Jecel and forcefully rescued him. In retaliation, RKB forces attacked Gaal Jecel militias in Calanley and briefly exchanged gunfire. There were no reports of casualties.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attack Kismayos airport over the course of three days, 30/04 , 01/05 and 02/05 with light and heavy weapons. Six reported dead. No report of return fire, though the event is described as a 'battle.' AMISOM air forces were deployed to the area in response.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attack Kismayos airport over the course of three days, 30/04 , 01/05 and 02/05 with light and heavy weapons. Six reported dead. No report of return fire, though the event is described as a 'battle.' AMISOM air forces were deployed to the area in response.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Pro-government forces attacked al Shabaab in Gubadka village (64km SE of Yeed) in the evening of 04/05. Al Shabaab withdrew from the village after they were overpowered by pro-government forces. Two al Shabaab members were reportedly killed while two others were injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified gunmen launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM forces based in Beytul Raas neighbourhood in Marka in the night of 06/05. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly before the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM forces manning a checkpoint in Shaqaalaha neighbourhood in Kismaayo in the evening of 07/05. The two sides exchanged RPGs and small arms fire. Other AMISOM in the area fired heavy artilleries in the direction of the al Shabaab fighters who withdrew after the brief exchange of gunfire. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM launched an attack against al Shabaab fighters position in Buulo Gaduud village (30km North of Kismaayo) in the morning of 08/05. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly before al Shabaab withdrew. There were no reports of casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and national forces attack al Shabaab locations and Goob Weyn (14km NE of Kismayo) and 'establish themselves.' It is not clear if base or headquarters was established, or if al Shabaab maintained a presence. Causalities unknown. AMISOM forces targeted the town for an air strike on 12/05.

ACTOR1: Raskamboni Brigade
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A large clash reported between Raskamboni forces and al Shabaab near the airport and university areas in Kismayo. The clashes stated after a hit-and run-style attack against AMISOM forces stationed at the airport. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: An anti-al Shabaab militia (name unknown) and AMISOM-KDF forces overtake an al Shabaab controlled village. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against Somali/AMISOM forces based in K60 area in Marka District in the evening of 09/10. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire which lasted for about 10 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: At least five people were killed and ten injured after al-Shabaab militants ambushed Somali and African Union Mission in Somalia (AMISOM) bases in Gof Gadud near Baidoa.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against Government/AMISOM troops based in Arbacow settlement located in southern direction of Afgooye corridor under Afgooye District in the evening of 14/05. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 20 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Al Shabaab elements attacked a pro-government position in Ceel Barde during the evening hours. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about fifteen minutes before the attackers withdrew. One pro-government soldier is killed and another injured. Four civilians were also killed in the exchange. Al Shabaab causalities are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters and anti-al Shabaab/AMISOM (KDF) clashed in Mudale village (40km E of Ceel Waaq) in the morning of 19/05. The clash reportedly broke out after anti-al Shabaab forces attacked al Shabaab positions 12kms east of Busaar.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/government forces base in Janaale settlement (Marka District) in the evening of 19/05. The two sides exchanged light and heavy weapons for about 10 minutes after which the al Shabaab attackers withdrew. There were no reports of casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab clashed with AMISOM and government forces after a military convoy travelling to Ballidoogle Airfiled is ambushed. Witnesses said two vehicles in the convoy were destroyed in the ambush. It is believed that a number of soldiers and officers were also killed, though no numbers were provided.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched coordinated hit and run attacks against AMISOM/National Government forces based in Hawa Abdi and Arbacow settlements in Afgooye District in the evening of 23/05. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 15 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Two AMISOM soldiers and a Somali soldier were injured in the clashes.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched an attack against Burundian AMISOM forces at Lafoole settlement in the morning hours. The clash lasted about 30 minutes. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and government forces clash with al Shabaab. Twelve al Shabaab deaths reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks a Kenyan position 40 km south of Dhobley. Causalities reported on both sides, though specific numbers were not provided.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked AMISOM/Somali forces based at Jowhar airstrip (Jowhar) in the morning of 26/05. Reports indicate that al Shabaab first fired a number of mortars rounds at the allied forces followed by a direct confrontation between the two sides. The fighting went on for more than an hour after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties from the warring sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Raskamboni Brigade
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces launch heavy artillery fire against AMISOM and Somali national forces based at Kismayo airport. No report of causalities. Al Shabaab had targeted Raskamboni forces at the airport days earlier.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked Somali/AMISOM forces in Goof-Gaduud village (25km SW of Baidoa) in the evening of 28/05. Three members of al Shabaab were reportedly killed in the clash.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attacked a AMISOM position in Janaale village. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire that lasted for about 10 minutes after which al Shabaab withdrew. Two AMISOM soldiers reportedly sustained minor injuries.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushed a AMISOM/Somali military convoy near Boholaar Village (Baidoa District) in the afternoon of 03/06. The two sides exchanged gunfire that lasted for about an hour after which al Shabaab withdrew. Three al Shabaab killed and two soldiers injured in the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces launched an attack against the position of AMISOM/Somalia government forces in an area between Bariire Village (27km SW of Afgooye) and Afgooye town in the evening of 03/06. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire that lasted for about 30 minutes after which al Shabaab withdrew. Unconfirmed report indicated that three combatants were killed and a number of others injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a mortar attack against KDF(AMISOM) forces positions in Faafax Dhuun Village (Baardheere District) in the afternoon of 03/06. The allied forces responded by firing artillery guns in the direction of the attackers. The clash lasted briefly after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Ten are killed in a clash between Somali/AMISOM forces and al Shabaab. The fighting began following an al Shabaab ambush on allied forces. According to local sources, the fighting lasted hours.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushed AMISOM forces (Sierra Leonean contingent) on routine security operation in Gheldezza Village (90km SW of Afmadow) on 05/06. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire for about half an hour after which al Shabaab withdrew. Four members of al Shabaab and one AMISOM soldier were killed and two other AMISOM were injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces destroyed a minibus reportedly carrying suspected al Shabaab members in the outskirts of Kismaayo in the night of 08/06. Causalities not known or not reported.

ACTOR1: Raskamboni Brigade
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Eighteen are killed when clashes between Raskamboni and Awramale militia continue for a second day. Among the dead are a Raskamboni commander by the name of 'Awil.' The spokesman of Jubaland State asserted the fighting was between Raskamboni and al Shabaab, not Awramale militia. As the day progressed AMISOM forces made their presence felt, causing Awramale fighters to surrender to them. Elders of the groups were eventually able to broker a ceasefire.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces clashed with al Shabaab while on routine patrol in Mayafulka town. Two members of al Shabaab were killed and two others wounded. Three AMISOM soldiers were also injured in the clash. Reports indicate that one al Shabaab battlewagon was destroyed during the fighting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushed a AMISOM military convoy in Buufow Bacaad Village in Marka District in the noon of 09/06. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab elements withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked an AMISOM/Somali position in Goof-Gaduud Village (25km SW of Baidoa) in the afternoon of 11/06. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. There were no reports of casualties.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ACTOR2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_2: Raskamboni Brigade
NOTES: Fourteen are dead following a clash between Keynan AMISOM backed by Raskamboni and government forces in Hosingow. The clash is believed to be related to soldier defection.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Heavy fighting reported between government forces/AMISOM and al Shabaab on the outskirts of Beled Weyne. 'Heavy causalities' reported by witnesses.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces ambushed a AMISOM/Somali position in Wanlaweyn. Gunfire was exchanged for approximately 30 minutes, resulting in three deaths of AMISOM/Somali forces. The Somali Memo is pro-al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Ethiopia (1991-2018)
NOTES: Al Shabaab carried out a series of attacks against AMISOM and Ethiopian forces in the Suuqa Xoolaha and Cunaaye neighbourhoods of the city. No report of causalities. The Somali Memo is pro-al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack a Sierra Leone (AMISOM) military base forces in Taabda location with heavy weapons. Casualties could not be established. The Somali Memo is pro-al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/anti-al Shabaab forces (unnamed) in Tabta (75km SW of Afmadow) in the night of 23/06. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushed a AMISOM/anti-al Shabaab militia security patrol the morning of 24/06. No causalities reported. The patrol was launched in response to an attack on a AMISOM water carrier the previous day.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces launched a hit and run attack against an AMISOM position in Badhaadhe in the night of 27/06. AMISOM forces responded with artillery fire forcing al Shabaab to withdraw. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack against the Kismaayo airport in the evening of 27/06. AMISOM forces based at the airport and the al Shabaab forces engaged in a serious fighting that lasted for an hour after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established. The is the second attack against the airport in as many days.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Raskamboni Brigade
NOTES: Raskamboni militia of Ahmed Madobe and the Kenyan AMISOM forces took full control of Kismayo after they jointly fought militias loyal to colonel Bare Hirale. Bare Hilale may have been injured. The battle was 'fierce' and claimed 'many causalities.'

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks Kismayo airport over the midnight hour, however, AMISOM forces rebuffed the attack. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM position near Maslah building area (Heliwa District) in the night of 01/07. The two sides reportedly exchanged gunfire that lasted for about 20 minutes after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack against Somali/AMISOM forces positions in Awdiinle Village (Baidoa District) in the night of 01/07. The fighting lasted for about 30 minutes after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An Shabaab fighter opened fire at an AMISOM helicopter with anti-craft gun (Dishka) from a distance of 10km SE of Baidoa in the morning of 03/07. The gunfire did not hit the helicopter and the plane landed safely.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against Somalia/AMISOM forces regular position near Shalaambood Village in Marka in the afternoon of 03/07. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire which lasted for about 20 minutes after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab publicly beheads a captured AMISOM soldier Bulo Mareer shortly after he is captured in a shootout. About 100 in the village witnessed the event. Radio al-Furqaan is pro-al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Three Somali soldiers are shot and killed during a shootout with al Shabaab. One allied AMISOM is captured and later publicly executed in the town square.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launches attacks on Kenyan bases stationed at Kismayo airport. Causalities reported, though precise numbers unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attacked AMISOM forces based in Janaale Village (18 NE of Qoryooley) in the evening of 10/07. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 20 minutes after which the al Shabaab withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militias launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/KDF positions in Badhaade in the night of 13/07. The clash lasted for 30 minutes. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked an AMISOM base in Shalaambood (Marka District) in the evening of 14/07. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire for about an hour after which al Shabaab withdrew. Local residents said the fighting was heavy, though casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/KDF in Bilis Qoqani Village (Afmadow District) in the morning of 15/07. The attack lasted only a few minutes after which the al Shabaab withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack against Somali/AMISOM forces stationed in Janaale (18 NE of Qoryooley) in the morning of 16/07. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about seven minutes after which al Shabaab withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces in Bilis Qooqani (48km SW of Afmadow) in the night of 17/07. AMISOM used artillery guns against al Shabaab during the clash which lasted for five minutes. Eight AMISOM deaths, seventeen injures reported. There was a similar clash in the town two days previous.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab operatives threw a hand grenade against AMISOM forces based in Jalle Siyaad Military Academy (Hodan District) in the evening of 19/07. Reports indicate that a brief armed clash which lasted for around 10 minutes followed the blast. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launches a late-night attack on AMISOM forces base located at Jowhar airport. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit-and run-attack against Somali/AMISOM forces based in Shalaambood in the night of 20/07. The clash lasted for a few minutes. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and run-attack against Somali/AMISOM forces based in Janaale in the night of 20/07. The clash lasted for a few minutes. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Al Shabaab conducted a hit-and-run attack against anti-al Shabaab (not identified) and AMISOM/KDF forces in Badhaade in the night of 20-21/07. The clash was reported as relatively intense and lasted for a few hours. Casualties could not be established. Al Shabaab withdrew after the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab conducted a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM positions in Tabta village in the night of 21/07. Reports indicate that the clash lasted for a few minutes with both sides using heavy weapons. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab conducted a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM positions in Qooqaani and Taabto locations in the night of 21/07. Reports indicate that the clash lasted for a few minutes with both sides using heavy weapons. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab conducted a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/Somali positions by the Jowhar airstrip in the night of 21/07. The fighting lasted for around 30 minutes. Casualties are unconfirmed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked Somali/AMISOM forces in Bilis Qooqaani at night of 22/07. The fighting lasted for about one hour. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AL Shabaab forces attack Kismayo airport, base for AMISOM forces in the area. Causalities not reported. The Somali Memo is typically biased toward al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack against Somali/AMISOM forces in Aawdinle Village (Baidoa District) in the evening of 23/07. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire for about 30 minutes after which the al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run against Somali/AMISOM forces based at the former Perfume Factory (Heliwa District) in the night of 24/07. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked the residence of the Baidoa District Commissioner (Baidoa) in the night of 24/07. The attackers started the attack with a RPG followed by an armed confrontation that lasted for about an hour. AMISOM forces arrived in the area and backed the Somali forces protecting the Comissioner, forcing al Shabaab forces to withdraw. Three Somali soldiers were wounded in the clash. Casualties from the al Shabaab side could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attacked an AMISOM base in Banaaney (2km NE of Beled Weyne airstrip) in the night of 25/07. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 10 minutes after which the attackers withdraw. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked an AMISOM position at KM60 in the night of 29/07. The fighting lasted for about 20 minutes.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab conducted a heavy attack against Somali/AMISOM position in Yaqberiweyne in early morning hours of 29/07. The fighting lasted for about 30 minutes. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked a position of Somali/AMISOM forces in Aw Dehegle in the night of 29/07. The fighting lasted for about 10 minutes. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militias launched a hit-and-run attack against an AMISOM/Somali position close to Iidow Jallad bridge (Yaaq Bari Weyne area) in the night of 30/07. The clash lasted for around 30 minutes. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Kenyan AMISOM forces clash with an unknown group in the outskirts of Kismayo. Precise date of the clash is vague. No causalities reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/Somali forces stationed in Arbacow neighbourhood in Ceelasha area (Afgooye District) in the evening of 03/08. The attack lasted for about 15 minutes. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al-Shabaab attacked several African Union Mission in Somalia (AMISOM) bases in Baidoa Sunday night (August 4th), wounding at least ten people.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militias conducted a hit-and-run attack against an AMISOM/Somali position in Shalaambood in the night of 06/08. The clash lasted for about 30 minutes. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militias conducted a hit-and-run attack against Somali/AMISOM forces based in Janaale in the morning of 07/08. The clash lasted for about 15 minutes. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: 24 al Shabaab are killed after AMISOM troops and local forces foiled planned attacks in southern city of Afmadow.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militiamen launched a hit-and-run attack against a Somali/AMISOM position in Lafoole College close to the Mogadishu-Afgooye road in the night of 09/08. The clash lasted for about 20 minutes. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militiamen launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Shalaambood in the evening of 10:08. The clash lasted for about 20 minutes. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ACTOR2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An AMISOM soldier (Djiboutian contingent) opened fire at some of his colleagues who were sitting in a small tent in an AMISOM military base on the east side of Beled Weyne in the morning of 12/08. One soldier was killed and another one wounded. It is reported that the soldier continued shooting until he emptied his magazine.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militiamen launched a hit-and-run attack against a Somali/AMISOM outpost in Arbacow area in Ceelasha in the night of 12/08. The clash lasted for about 25 minutes. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against an AMISOM position in Tabta (75km SW of Afmadow) in the afternoon of 14/08. There were no reports on whether AMISOM forces responded to the attack. Al Shabaab withdrew immediately. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/KDF in Badhaadhe in the night of 16/08. The two sides exchanged both light and heavy gunfire briefly after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew. A civilian woman was injured in the clash. Casualties from the warring sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Almed clash reported between Dhamase and Ceel Cadde. Causalities not known. This is a separate incident from the event with occurred in Ceel Cadde in the same day.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Heavy fighting broke out between AMISOM/KDF and al Shabaab fighters in Kulbiyow Village (33km SW of Badhaadhe) in evening of 18/08 after al Shabaab fighters attacked the position of KDF. Casualties could be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed a KDF military convoy in an area between Dhamase and Ceel-Cadde villages in Garbahaarey District in the afternoon of 18/08. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/Somali forces based in Janaale (18km NE of Qoryooley) in the night of 19/08. The two sides exchanged both light and heavy gunfire during the brief clash after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against KDF/AMISOM position at Kismaayo Airport in the evening of 21/08. The KDF responded by firing back in the direction of the attackers, after which the suspected al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces launch an attack against allied bases in Janaale, sparking a heavy two day battle. No casualties have been confirmed yet but residents say that both fighting groups have incurred death and injury.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces launch an attack against allied bases in Janaale, sparking a heavy two day battle. No casualties have been confirmed yet but residents say that both fighting groups have incurred death and injury.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al-Shabab fighters say they have killed 21 Kenyan and Somali government troops in southern Somalias Lower Shabeelle Region in attacks on their bases. Presice locations of the attacks unknown. The attacks have not been confirmed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushed an AMISOM military convoy in an area between Leego and Yaaq Biri Weyne (Buur Hakaba and Wanla Weyne Districts) in the afternoon of 24/08. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire in a fighting that lasted for about 40 minutes after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Raskamboni Brigade
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces launched a simultaneous attack against AMISOM and Raskamboni forces stationed at the cities airport and university. The attack occurred in the evening. Causalities not reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Raskamboni Brigade
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against KDF/ Ras Kaambooni forces based in Badhaadhe in the evening of 26/08. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about an hour after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack against KDF and anti-al Shabaab forces in Fafaax Dhuun Village (Baardheere District) in the morning of 27/08. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 30 minutes after which al Shabaab withdrew. Two anti-al Shabaab soldiers were reportedly wounded in the clash. Casualties from the KDF and al Shabaab could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against anti-al Shabaab forces (likely AMISOM) based near Kismaayo airport (Kismaayo) in the night of 27/08. The fighting lasted for about five minutes after which the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack against Somali/AMISOM forces base in Hoosh neighbourhood (Dharkeynley District) in night of 28/08. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab launched an attack against AMISOM/Somalia forces position in Janaale Village (18km NE of Qoryooley) in the evening of 28/08. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 15 minutes after which al Shabaab withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM forces based in Shalaambood Village (Marka District) in the evening of 28/08. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces clash with al Shabaab in the Barafuunka and Salaxa areas of Heliwa. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM and al Shabab clash in Yaaqbari District, southern Lower Shabeellee Region. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM/Somali forces based in Shalaambood (Marka District) in the night of 09/09. The two sides exchanged both light and heavy gunfire, after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM/Somali forces based in Ceel Jaale (7km SW of Marka) in the night of 09/09. The two sides exchanged both light and heavy gunfire after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM/Somali forces base in Janaale Village (18km NE of Qoryooley) in the night of 09/09. The two sides exchanged both light and heavy gunfire, after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched attacks on government and AMISOM forces in Berdaale town. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab targeted government and AMISOM positions with heavy artillery fire in Mogadishu over the night of 09/09. No causalities reported.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab targeted government and AMISOM positions with heavy artillery fire in Mogadishu over the night of 09/09. No causalities reported. The attack in Heliwa occurred near the perfume factory, a local landmark.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An AMISOM soldier in military uniform was found dead along the seaside (about 200m) from the International Camp, inside within the AMISOM protected area in Mogadishu Airport (Medina District) in the morning of 09/09. Although the cause of his death was not identified, reports indicate that the body had bruises.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militiamen conducted a hit-and-run attack against an AMISOM/Somali position in Yaaq-Biri-Weyne (Wanla Weyne District) in the evening of 10/09. The clash lasted for about 15 minutes. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Kenyan AMISOM forces come under attack in Bilis Qooqaani, three reported deaths.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM forces (Burundian contingent) based in Ceel Haji (3km NE of Marka) in the night of 15/09. The two sides exchanged both light and heavy gunfire during the fighting that lasted for about 25 minutes, after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab militiamen reportedly conducted a hit-and-run attack against an AMISOM (Kenya) position in Bilis Qooqani in the evening of 17/09. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Government forces backed by African Union troops have clash against Al-Shabab at a locality between Yaaqbari Weyne and Wanaweyn in Lower Shabeelle region. The fighting began after Al-Shabab fighters attacked a convoy of Somali army in the area. Causalities reported, no numbers provided.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militias conducted a hit-and-run attack against an AMISOM/Somali position in Yaaq Biri Weyne (Wanla-Weyne District) in the morning of 18/09. The clash lasted for about 20 minutes. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Somali and AMISOM forces reportedly took control of Mahadaay (21km N of Jowhar) in the morning of 19/09. The AMISOM/Somali forces entered the village from the SE and SW. Most al Shabaab militias had left the town before the attack. The government forces encountered no resistance except for a brief skirmish with a group of al Shabaab militiamen close to Saabuun bridge at the entrance of the town. One al Shabaab member was reported killed.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers threw a hand grenade at Somali/AMISOM base in the livestock market area (Heliwa District) in the night of 19/09. The soldiers opened fire after the blast. No casualties were reported. The attackers managed to escape.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM forces travelling between Baidoa and Goof-Gaduud/ Shabeelow Village (25KM SW of Baidoa) in the morning of 22/09. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/Somali government forces base in Lafoole settlement (Afgooye District) in the night of 22/09. The two sides reportedly exchanged heavy gunfire for about 20 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. One soldier was reportedly injured but reports indicate the casualties could be more.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Somali government forces aided by African peacekeepers (AMISOM) seized control of Biyo Cadde town. Three members of al Shabaab reported killed in the fighting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM/Somali forces based in Yaaq Biri Weyne (22 km W of Wanla Wayne) in the evening of 25/09. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire including RPGs for about one hour after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties from the warring sides could not be established. Reports indicate that AMISOM/Somali forces conducted a security operation in the area prior to the attack and arrested two persons they suspected of being al Shabaab operatives.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab launched an attack against AMISOM/Somali forces positioned in Shalaambood Village (Marka District) in the night of 25/09. Reports indicate that the fighting lasted for about 15 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM/Somali forces clash with al Shabaab in Kulbiyow sub-district in the Lower Juba region. The clash lasted for several hours; causalities not yet known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM forces based in Lafoole settlement (Afgooye District) in the night of 29/09. The warring sides used both heavy and light weapons during the clash which lasted for 30 minutes. Unconfirmed reports indicate that three combatants were injured in the clash.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM forces based in Arbacow settlement (13km E of Afgooye) in the evening of 29/09. Both sides used heavy and light weapons during the clash which lasted for 30 minutes. Reports indicate that this attack was launched simultaneously with the one in Lafoole settlement. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM personnel come under attack formal Shabaab at their base in Beledweyne. AMISOM forces claim to have 'defeated the group and inflicted losses.'

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit and run attack against AMISOM/Somali forces based in Yaaq Biri Weyne (22km W of Wanla Weyne) in the night of 01/10. Both sides reportedly used heavy weapons. The clash lasted for about 20 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/Somali forces stationed in Ceel-shelling area near K60 in Marka District in the night of 02/10. The fighting continued for about 10 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit and run attack against AMISOM base in Lidow Jallaad near Yaaq Biri Weyne Village (22km NW of Wanla Weyne) in the night of 03/10. The fighting lasted about 20 minutes. Causalities are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM forces based in 21st October neighbourhood (Afgooye) in night of 07/10. The fighting lasted for about 15 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Somali/AMISOM forces clash with al Shabaab in and around Yaaq Biri Weyne Village. Causalities could not established. Security forces conducted a joint security operation following the attack, but made no arrests.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a hand grenade at AMISOM (Djiboutian contingent) on patrol in Xawo Tako neighbourhood (Beled Weyne) in the night of 08/10. The soldiers opened fire after the blast. Two civilian bystanders were injured in the blast and the subsequent shooting. The perpetrators managed to escape.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked AMISOM forces based in Shalaambood Village (10km W of Marka) in the night of 08/10. The fighting lasted for a few minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM position in Janaale Village (12km NW of Marka) in the night of 08/10. The clash lasted for few minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM forces positioned in Carbiska settlement (Afgooye District) in the night of 09/10. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit and run attack against AMISOM base in Lidow Jallaad near Yaaq Biri Weyne Village (22km NW of Wanla Weyne) in the evening of 11/10. The fighting lasted for about 15 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. No causalities were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/anti-al Shahaab forces (not named) based in the outskirts of Afmadow in the night of 12/10. A civilian was hit and injured by a stray bullet.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack AMISOM positions in Baadhaade, causing 'heavy battle.' Two killed, others wounded.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Somali troops backed by the African Union Mission in Somalia (AMISOM) clashed with al-Shabaab near Elasha Biyaha in Lower Shabelle after the militants attacked government bases. No reported injuries or deaths.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack Siinka Dheer and Ceelasha Biyaha positions outside Mogadishu. Amisom troops are believed to have suffered heavy casualties in the attack. Sabaax is pro-al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit and run attack against anti-al Shabaab/AMISOM forces based in Kulbiyow (33km SW of Badhadhe) in the evening of 16/10. The fighting lasted for 30 minutes after the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Majority of the local residents fled the village during the clash. Reports indicate that the fighting caused tension in the village.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/Somali position in Iidow Jallaad near Yaaq Biri Weyne (22km W of Wanla Weyne) in the evening of 18/10. The fighting lasted for about 10 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Arbacow settlement (Afgooye District) in the evening of 21/10. The fighting lasted for about 15 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM forces based in Ceel Saliindi Village (K60 area) in Marka District in the night of 21/10. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: A hit-and-run attack targets a AMISOM/Somali position on the east side of the city. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Anti-Al Shabaab)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against anti-al Shabaab/KDF-AMISOM forces in Bilis Qooqaani (48km NW of Afmadow) in the evening of 22/10. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM military convoy in an area between Maslah Camp and the former perfume factory (Heliwa District) in the evening of 24/10. The two sides exchanged gun fire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM troops on foot patrol in Janaale Village in the night of 25/10. The AMISOM troops in Janaale started to patrol areas around their base in the village after several hit-and-run attacks by al Shabaab fighters. Both sides suffered casualties but the exact figures are unclear. Al Shabaab fighters brought some of their injured colleagues to Qoryooley.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Somali and AMISOM forces clash with al Shabaab in Ceelasha Biyaha. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Arbacow settlement (13km E of Afgooye) in the night of 24/10. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 15 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab kills five AMISOM-Sierra Leone soldiers in an attack on their base in Taabta. Conflicting reports hold the AMISOM force was of the Kenyan contingent. Further reports dispute the event even occurred.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM/Sierra Leone supply convoy on the way from Dhoobley between Gheldezza and Tabta (53 KM E of Dhoobley) in the afternoon on 29/10. Casualties from both sides could not be ascertained.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Bali-Doogle airport (Wanla-Weyne District) in the evening of 31/10/2013. The clash lasted for about 30 minutes. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against the AMISOM base in Bilis Qooqaani (48km NW of Afmadow) in the evening of 01/11. Both sides exchanged sporadic gunfire which lasted for around one hour. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers threw a hand grenade against AMISOM forces in Ruusiya neighbourhood in Marka District in the evening of 02/11/2013. The AMISOM soldiers were guarding a water tanker that had been destroyed by a RCIED on 01/11. The soldiers opened fire after the blast. The attackers escaped from the scene.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
