NOTES: Al Shabaab launches a hit-and-run style attack against AMISOM/SNG forces at Qoryooley for the third consecutive day. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters have launched hit and run attack against Somali government/AMISOM forces based in Buulo Burto in the night of 26/05. Reports indicate that both sides have exchanged gunfire for about 15 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out an attack against AMISOM/SNG forces based in Qoryooley town in the evening of 26/07. Reports indicate that the al Shabaab fighters have attacked the allied forces from different directions. Both sides have used heavy gunfire which lasted for about one hour after which the attackers withdrew. Unspecified numbers of civilians were reportedly injured. Casualties from the fighting sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: Militia (Pro-Government)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters have launched a hit and run attack against Pro-SNG (not identified)/AMISOM forces positions in Goof-gaduud (25km SW of Baidoa) in the evening of 26/05. Unconfirmed reports indicate that four pro-SNG soldiers were killed in the clash. Casualties from al Shabaab side could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNG forces launched an attack against al Shabaab fighters positions near Garas-Jereed (7km NE of Qoryooley) in the morning of 27/05. Reports indicate that fiercest fighting have been engaged by both sides where heavy artillery was used. The SNG/AMISOM new attack was reportedly a kind of retaliation of al Shabaab attack against them a day before. Six al Shabaab fighters bodies including foreign fighters (probably Kenyan) were displayed in Qoryooley town later in the afternoon.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al-Shabaab launched a deadly attack on bases of Kenyan troops in Kismaayo towns local University area. Casualties have not been confirmed so far as Al-Shabab and Kenyan forces have not provided details regarding the fighting.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Somali government forces backed by AMISOM [African Unions Mission in Somalia] troops have killed a senior Al-Shabab commander responsible named Shaykh Dahir Husayn. The death was reported following an extensive clash in Deel location, outside of Xudur.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attack government forces stationed at the former perfume factory in Heliwa district. Even though the fighting only continued for a short period of time, one person died while several others were injured in the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Ethiopia (1991-2018)
NOTES: AMISOM reports they have killed 74 al Shabaab fighters during a clash in Ato. Conflicting, al Shabaabs propaganda sources claim to have killed 13 Ethiopian-AMISOM fighters. The Bakool government confirmed the clash. The ENDF was also involved in the clash. The fighting may have occurred on 31/05.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Three Al-Shabab militants have been killed in fierce fighting between the group and Somali government forces backed by Amisom troops from Ethiopia in Ceel Buur. Later causality figures were revised upward to 6 dead, 10 wounded - Hiiraan.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM military convoy in the outskirts of Qoryooley in the morning of 04/06. The two sides used heavy gunfire during the clash. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM forces launch an attack on an al Shabaab position outside Ceel Bur. The fighting eventually spread to the nearby communities of Adaayo, Dacar and Ceel Huur. Somali forces said they killed 'many' Al-Shabab fighters in the battle and captured up to 12 of them.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces launched an attack against a group of al Shabaab fighters near Mashalaay (9km SE of Qoryooley) in the afternoon of 05/06. The AMISOM forces carried out the attack after receiving information on al Shabaab fighters regrouping in the area. Reports indicate that the two sides engaged a fierce fighting for about 20 minutes. Three AMISOM soldiers were reportedly killed while six others were injured. Casualties from al Shabaab fighters sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM military convoy in Leego Village (22km W of Wanla Weyne) in the morning of 05/06. Both sides exchanged heavy gunfire after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Unconfirmed reports indicate that one AMISOM vehicle was damaged in the attack. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/Somali forces in Wajiid in the night of 05/06. The two sides exchanged gunfire for briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: At least 13 Al Shabaab militants and four government-AMISOM soldiers have been reported dead in fierce clashes near Bakool regional capital of Xudur. The clash began following an assault from al Shabaab. The attack was an apparent retaliation after the events at Buuraha Sanweyne.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/Somali forces small base at the outskirts of Bilis Qooqaani (48km SW of Afmadow) in the evening of 09/06. Reports indicate that the two sides clashed briefly after which the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An Ethiopian AMISOM convoy is attacked in Waajid by unidentified assailants. Casualties numbers were not articulated.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a hand grenade at AMISOM forces in Ruusiya neighbourhood (Marka) in the evening of 15/06. The soldiers opened fire after the blast. One civilian was killed and four others injured in the shooting. AMISOM casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab insurgents ambushed an AMISOM convoy outside Ceel Waaq while it was en route to Eel-Adde. Causalities not know, but one the vehicles was burnt by the attackers.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks AMISOM ships near Mudawa Island in an effort to interrupt ships ferrying from Mombasa to Kismaayo. Injuries/causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy near Buulo Sheekh Village (5km SE of Qoryooley) in the evening of 18/06. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. The convoy was heading to Qoryooley when the incident happened. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces in Lafoole (6km SE of Afgooye) in the evening of 18/06. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 30 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. One civilian was killed two others were injured. Casualties of the warring sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A group of al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and run attack against an AMISOM base in the vicinity of Ceel Haji (3km NE of the Marka). Reports indicate that the fighting lasted for about five minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab militia has fired several mortar rounds to AMISOM military base in Buulo Brute in the afternoon of 21/06. The forces have moved in the direction of the attackers. The two sides briefly exchanged gunfire for about 20 minutes after which al Shabaab withdrew. Casualties couldn't be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters clash with AMISON-Djibouti forces in Buulobarde following a series of mortar attacks. Sources say that al Shabaab 'suffered heavy losses' and returned to Buulo Berde.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNG forces launched an attack against al Shabaab fighters regrouping themselves in Dharkenley village (4km W of Qoryooley District) in the morning of 22/06. Reports indicate that the allied forces carried out the attack after receiving a tip-off from the members of the public. Both sides exchanged gunfire for a few minutes after which the AS fighters were reportedly defeated. A SNG official said that they have killed three AS fighters and injured another three. Casualties from the allied forces could not be established. It is not clear if government forces took control of the location.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Pro-Government)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM/pro-SNG (not identified) convoy passing in the vicinity of Dida Adey (23km SW of Badhaadhe) in the morning of 23/6. Reports indicate that heavy fighting followed the ambush which lasted for about two hours after which the attackers withdrew. Two pro-SNG soldiers were killed and their bodies brought to Kolbiyow for burial. Casualties from the attackers sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A fierce confrontation broke out in-between Bardaale and Qansadheer districts between Al-Shabab fighters and African Union troops (AMISOM). The conflict broke out after al Shabaab ambushed pro-government soldiers convoy as it left Bardheere district en-route to Qansadheer. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Two suspected al Shabaab fighters dressed in SNG military uniform, armed with AK-47 rifles and unspecified explosive devices attacked an AMISOM base (Djiboutian contingent) near Camalow Hotel (one source claims the source as Amalow hotel) in the morning of 26/06. Initial reports indicate that the attackers threw explosive devices probably (hand grenades) at the main entrance of the base to clear their way in and started shooting. AMISOM guards on the watch-tower shot and killed both attackers. Casualties from AMISOM sides could not be established. Al Shabaab claimed the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Clash reported on the outskirts of Xudur between AMISOM and member of al Shabaab. Although the precise numbers of casualties and losses have not yet been specified, residents nearby the town reported to Shabelle that severe fatalities were caused, judging by the sounds of the exchange of gunfire, they said. Another sources describes the killings as 'severe.'

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNG forces launched an attack against al Shabaab fighters in Gol-Weyn (22km SW of Marka) in the afternoon of 27/06. The allied forces carried the attack after receiving information that al Shabaab had been planning to set up a temporary base near the village. A number of AMISOM soldiers were reportedly injured in the clash. Al Shabaab casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected Al-Shabab militants launched [an] attack on Somali government and Djibouti forces base in the outskirts of Hiraan regional capital of Beled Weyne of central Somalia overnight on Friday [27 June], Garowe Online [GO] reports. Beled Weyne residents tell GO that heavy gunfire could be heard in Beled Weyne neighbourhoods. No casualty figures have so far been disclosed to the media but Somali army commanders said they have repelled militant attack on their base.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces in Beled Weyne in the evening of 28/06. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces in Ceel Haji (3km NE of Marka) in the evening of 28/06. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire for about 15 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces in (32km SW of Afgooye) in the evening of 28/06. The two sides engaged in serious exchange of various kinds of weaponry fire. Al Shabaab fighters later withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attack AMISOM and Somali forces in Carbiska. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Heavy fighting broke out in Qoryooley town of southern Somalias Lower Shabeelle Region last night after Al-Shabab fighters launched attacks on army, AU bases in the region. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces in Shalaambood Village (10km W of Marka) in the night of 29/06. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 15 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM base in Danow Village (16km W of Marka) in the night of 29/06. The fighting lasted for few minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Heavily armed al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM forces in Qoryooley in the night of 30/06. The al Shabaab fighters launched the attack from different directions and managed to enter some parts of the town. The fighting lasted for about thirty minutes after which the attackers withdrew.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked an aircraft caring AMISOM-government military supplies to Ceel Bur. No causalities reported. Is is not clear if the attack brought down the aircraft.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A group of al Shabaab fighters conducted an ambush against an AMISOM convoy passing between Leego and Buur Hakaba in the evening of 03/07. Report indicate that the ambush followed a heavy fighting which lasted for about an hour after which the al Shabaab attacker were repulsed. Further reports indicate that the AMISOM forces spent the night at the incident area and continued their journey to Buur Hakaba in the following morning. Causalities from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and run attack against AMISOM position in Zimbabwe village (Waajid District) in the evening of 05/07. Reports indicate that the two sides exchanged fire for about six minutes the attackers withdrew. One soldier was reportedly injured. Casualties from the suspected al Shabaab side could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM base in Bilis Qooqaani (48km SW of Afmadow) in the evening of 06/07. Reports indicate that the two sides exchanged fire for about 10 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighter conducted a hit and run attack against AMISOM/SNG position in Goof-Gaduud Shabeelow (26 KM SW of Baidoa) in the evening of 07/07. Reports indicate that several al Shabaab fighters were injured in the clash. Casualties from AMISOM/SNG could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters reportedly burned a truck full of food belonging to local businessmen in the vicinity of Tuulo Barwaqo (21km N of Garbahareey) in the afternoon of 08/07. Reports indicate that AMISOM convoy arrived at the scene immediately forcing the al Shabaab fighters to flee from the area. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM position in Carbiska area (5Kkm SE of Afgooye District) in the night of 08/07. Both sides exchanged different types of weapons during the clash. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked AMISOM forces in War-Wiin Kamiisle (61km SE of Yeed) in the night of 12/07. The two sides used various kinds of weapons in the clash. The AMISOM forces were part of the troops that had escorted food supplies to other AMISOM f

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM (KDF) base in Afmadow in the night of 12/07. Both sides exchanged gunfire for a few minutes after which the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: Police Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack Somali and Kenyan-AMISOM forces during the night-time hours in Faafaxdhuun District. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces in Qoryooley in the evening of 15/07. The two sides exchanged different types of gunfire during the brief clash. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED targeted an AMISOM convoy in Rusiya neighbourhood (Marka) in the morning of 16/07. AMISOM soldiers opened fire after the blast. Unconfirmed numbers of civilians were injured in the shooting. A fuel tanker was badly damaged in the explosion. AMISOM vehicles destroyed five residential houses as result of the confusion. The perpetrators escaped.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: An unidentified group attacks a group of AMISOM-SNG forces in Farxaane. Causalities/injuries not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Ambush against KDF in Welmaro Village (38km NE of Afmadow) by al Shabaab fighters on 16/07.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: A car strapped with explosive devices mainly IED bombs blasted at a checkpoint in Dannow, near Marka, on the outskirts of Qoryoley district in Lower Shabelle region. As confirmed, 2 soldiers were killed in the explosion and 3 others were wounded. The vehicle blasted a checkpoint allegedly filled with government soldiers (including AMISOM) and personnel, according to local residents. Perpetrators not known. Locals have reported to Shabelle that the fight also affected towns in the district like Maanyo Mudug, Farhanle and Abdi Ali, though it is not clear if any fighting took place in any of these areas. Conflicting reports hold five dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters opened fire towards Xudur town in the evening of 17/07. The motive is reportedly to show their presence in the area. AMISOM forces responded by firing artillery guns in the direction of the al Shabaab fighters. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM base in Bulo Burto in the night of 17/07. Reports indicate that a Shabaab fighters used heavy artillery while AMISOM responded gunfire after which the attackers withdrew. A civilian man was killed while four others including a pregnant woman were injured in the shootout. Casualties from the warring sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Around midday, AMISOM (ENDF) arrived in the village of Kerow Malaaq and clashed with the al Shabaab fighters. Seven al Shabaab fighters and two civilians were reportedly killed in the latest clash. AMISOM forces reportedly seized six machine guns from the al Shabaab fighters.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM base in Afmadow in the night of 19/07. Reports indicate that both sides exchange gunfire for a short brief after which the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM forces based at Western side of Bulo Burto in the afternoon of 20/07. Reports indicate that AMISOM forces repulsed the attackers. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab and Government troops clashed at Toos Weyne near Bardaale on Monday. According to a Bay Region reporter, the fighting erupted after al Shabaab attacked bases manned by the government forces in that area. The fighting was also taken part by fighter jets of KDF Contingent of AMISOM who were striking and were assisting the government troops. So far, there are no confirmations regarding the casualty figures. Many civilians were displaced by recurrent clashes like this in the area in the last few days.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militias fired a number of mortar rounds at AMISOM (Djibouti) base in Bulo Burte in the afternoon of 22/07. AMISOM forces moved to the direction of the attack where they engaged in a gun battle with al Shabaab fighters that went on for half an hour. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED targeted an AMISOM convoy passing near Barakat Cemetery (Yaaqshiid District) in the evening of 22/07. Reports indicate that the AMISOM forces open fire after the blast. The perpetrators managed to escape from the scene. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces attack and destroy an al Shabaab camp in Kismayo. Causalities not reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Forces belonging to the African Union Mission to Somalia (Amisom) captured a camp used by Al-Shabaab to train militants in the Gedo area of Bula Hawa. No causalities reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out hit and run attack against AMISOM/SNG position in Khadijo Hagi village 42kms SW of Belet Xaawo in the evening of 25/07. Heavy fighting lasted approximately an hour, and heavy machine guns and artillery shells were fired by KDF. Casualties on both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM in Danow village (8 KM NW of Shalaambood) on 26/07. There was an exchange of gun fire for around 15 minutes and after that, al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No reports of casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and run attack against AMISOM position in Rabdhure in the night of 27/07. Both sides exchanged gun fire which lasted a few minutes after that al Shabaab withdrew from the town. No casualties were reported from any side.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab gunmen attack Jubba and AMISOM forces at the Kismayo Universities area late in the evening. Causality numbers not provided.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM and al Shabaab forces clash near the K50 area. Reports of severe fatalities but the precise number has not been specified. Locals have reported exchange of gunfire for which they could hear it for hours. Precise date not entirely clear.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack a joint military base on the outskirts of Bulo Burde late in the night-time hours. Six to nine reported al Shabaab deaths. Al Shabaab made several more attempts at the base the following day.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified gunmen opened fire towards Jazeera Gate of Mogadishu Airport (Wadajir-Medina District) in the night of 09/08. AMISOM forces guarding the gate reportedly did not respond to the incoming fire. The attackers escaped.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack an AMISOM base at Bulo Barde after a failed attempt the previous night. Eighteen reported dead on both sides. Note: it is not clear is the count of 18 is the total of the fighting on 09/08 only, or a total of the two days of fighting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Somali National Army forces together with AU peacekeeping troops fought against Al Shabaab militants outside Qoryooley town. The witness said the fighting erupted after Al Shabaab fighters armed with launchers propelled grenades and machine guns attacked on allied forces, conducting security operation in Xero 1-aad and Xero 2-aad at outside in the town. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against SNG/AMISOM forces based on the outskirts of Bulo Burte in the night of 10/08. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 10 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG forces in Bulo Burte on 12/8. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 15 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM positions in Ceelasha settlement (Afgooye) in the night of 13/08. The two sides exchanged gunfire for 15 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_2: Abgal-Daud Clan Militia (Somalia)
NOTES: NISA forces and militia loyal to the former District Commissioner of Wadajir, Ahmed Hassan Cadow 'Daci' clashed in Argada area (Wadajir/Medina District) in the dawn of 15/08. The fighting was initiated by the NISA forces who attacked the residence of the former DC. The fighting intensified after NISA reportedly sought the support of AMISOM while Dacis militia was reinforced by other militias from Abgal/Daud/Iroole Muse. Media reports indicate that the residences of Omar Mohamed Finish, a SNG MP and another politician called Abdullahi Sheikh Hassan (all Abgal) were also attacked and their militias fought a united front against AMISOM/SNG forces. The two sides used both light and heavy weapons during the clash. Unconfirmed reports indicate that Ahmed Daci escaped towards Jazeera, along the coast of Mogadishu. Shabelle Media Network reports five dead, some witnesses claim a greater range. Several arrested.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against KDF/SNG forces in Faafax Dhuun (75km W of Baardheere) in the night of 16/08. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Government of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: The convoy of the Governor of Hiraan region was ambushed around Doonmalayka village (11 Km SW of Beleteeyn) in the afternoon of 19/09 when the convoy was returning from his tour to newly recovered villages to set up an interim administration. AMISOM escorts responded with heavy weaponry. One al Shabaab fighter whose body was left behind is confirmed dead while two AMISOM soldiers were wounded in the attack. The convoy reached safely Beletweyne.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM (KDF) warplanes bombed al Shabaab bases in Khadijo Haji Village and Gaddoondhowe villages (39km and 82km SW of Beled Xawo) in the morning of 20/08. AMISOM and al Shabaab fighters also clashed in the two villages. Allied forces were able to overtake and gain control of Gaddoondhowe. Casualties could not be initially established, though it was later learned 17 were reported dead in total.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM (KDF) warplanes bombed al Shabaab bases in Khadijo Haji Village and Gaddoondhowe villages (39km and 82km SW of Beled Xawo) in the morning of 20/08. AMISOM and al Shabaab fighters also clashed in the two villages. Allied forces were able to overtake and gain control of Gaddoondhowe. Casualties could not be initially established, though it was later learned 17 were reported dead in total.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A group of al Shabaab fighters fired heavy machine guns rounds towards AMISOM base in Rabdhure in the evening of 23/08 and withdrew quickly. The AMISOM forces did not respond to the attack. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed SNG/AMISOM convoy near Yaaq Biri Weyne (22km W of Wanla Weyne) in the afternoon of 27/08. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire that lasted for more than 30 minutes. The convoy came from Baidoa and was heading Bali Doogle when the incident happened. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNG forces launched an attack against al Shabaab fighters near Buulo Mareer (30km SW of Marka) in the morning of 30/08. Reports indicate that an intensive fight broke out between the two sides which lasted for three hours after which the allied forces managed to take over the town. Casualties from both sides could not be established. Later in the evening al Shabaab retaliated with heavy mortar fire toward the town. Al Shabaab later claims to have killed 20 solders between this operation and a clash in nearby Golweyn, despite the loss of territory.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab clashes with AMISOM at Golweyn. Al Shabaab later claims to have killed 20 AMISOM soldiers between Bulo Mareer and Golweyn.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM/SNG forces at Mukai Dumis (12km E of Kurtunwaarey) in the afternoon of 31/08. The ambush followed by a brief armed clash before the al Shabaab fighters withdrew towards Kurtunwaarey town. The allied forces proceed and captured Kurtunwaarey town without any resistance from al Shabaab fighters. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM positions in Jeerow village (11km SW of Qoryooley) in the night of 31/08. Both sides exchanged different types of gunfire including RPGs during the fight which lasted for about fi

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit-and run attack against remaining SNG/AMISOM positions in Fiidow (50km N of Jowhar) in the night of 01/09. Both sides exchanged gunfire for few minutes after which the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported. Al Shabaab had gained control of the village the previous day.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighter ambushed against SNG/AMISOM convoy near Fiidow village (50km N of Jowhar) in the evening of 02/09. Reports indicate that the two sides clashed for 20 minutes. The convoy left Fiidow and were heading towards Hareo Lugoole (19km SW of Jalalaqsi) when the clash happened. Al Shabaab later announced through Radio Andalus that the attack killed a AMISOM-Brundi commander.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out three successive hit and run attacks against SNG/AMISOM convoy in Garasiyaani village (53km SE of Beled-weyne) in the morning of 03/09. Reports indicate that the two sides clashed for 30 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. The convoy was heading to Buulo Burte. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted an ambush against SNG/AMISOM forces escorting food aid convoy at Beero Yabaal village (22km NW of Buulo Burte) in the morning of 04/09. Reports indicate that the two sides engaged fighting for about 20 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Two soldiers (SNG & Djiboutian) were killed while on al Shabaab side 10 fighters were reportedly killed. The convoy proceeds after the ambush and safely reached Buulo Burte.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed a food convoy donated by Arab agency and escorted by AMISOM/SNG forces in an area between Qansax Dheere and Buur dhuubo in the afternoon of 06/09. Reports indicate that the al Shabaab fighters reportedly open fire against the convoy from a distance and disappeared in to the bush. No casualties were reported. The convoy safely reached Buur dhuubo.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and run attack against AMSOM/SNG base in Goof-Gaduud Shabeelow (26km SW of Baidoa District) in the morning of 07/09. Both sides exchanged gunfire which lasted for about an hour after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. A SNG soldier was killed while casualties from al Shabaab side could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: A group of al Shabaab fighters ambushed a Food aid convoy escorted by AMISOM/SNG forces near Washaaq Baar (16km NW of Garbahareey) in the afternoon of 07/09. Reports indicate that both sides briefly exchanged heavy gunfire after which the attackers were reportedly overwhelmed. The convoy was coming from Buur Dhuubo and heading to Garbahareey when the ambush happened. Six al Shabaab fighters were reportedly killed while about 10 others were injured. Casualties from the allied forces could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted an ambush against AMISOM/SNG convoy passing near Buur weyn village (30km SW of Bulo Burte) in the morning of 08/09. Reports indicate that the two sides engaged fighting for about 30 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. The convoy was from Buulo Burte heading to Jalalaqsi town when they were ambush happened. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Ceel Saliini (32km SW of Afgooye) in the night of 08/09. Both sides exchanged different types of gunfire during the fight. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM position in Buurdhuubo Village (36km SE Garbahaarey) on 09/09. AMISOM responded with artillery guns and al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters fired some small arms fire towards the airport in the evening of 09/09 and withdrew quickly. AMISOM forces did not respond to the attack. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters open fire at the airport and withdrew quickly (09/09). AMISOM did not respond.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM position in Xudur in the night of 10/09. AMISOM responded with artillery and al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushes a group of AMISOM-Ethiopian fighters at Bur-sagaar area, about five kilometres from Barwaaqo village. Al Shabaab reports six AMISOM dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy in Tuulo Barwaqo Village (20km NW of Garbahaarey) in the morning of 10/09. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Three al Shabaab fighters were reportedly killed and a number of others were captured. AMISOM casualties could not be established. The convoy had left Luuq and was heading to Garbahaarey when the ambush took place.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters fired at AMISOM base in Waajid from a far distance in the night of 10/09 and retreated quickly. AMISOM forces did not respond to the attack. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM position in Rabdhuure Village (Yeed District) on 10/09. AMISOM responded with artillery and al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces clash with al Shabaab in Buurdhuubo after an al Shabaab attack. Al Shabaab claims 'great losses', but did not include specifics.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab clashes with AMISOM-Ethiopian forces in Ceel Garas, eventually overtaking the town. Causalities not known,

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a Molotov cocktail at an AMISOM convoy near Livestock Market (Heliwa District) in the afternoon of 13/09. Reports indicate that the AMISOM convoy reacted with gunfire after the blast. A civilian bystander was injured in the subsequent shooting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A group of al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM position in Ceel-Saliini (Ceel Shiikh?) (32km SW Afgooye) in the afternoon of 13/09. Both sides exchanged different types of weapons for about 20 minutes. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Mashalaay (9km SE of Qoryooley) in the night of 13/09. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Pro-Government)
NOTES: AMISOM/Pro-SNG forces launched an attack against al Shabaab fighters based at Lagta Berta (25km SE of Badhaadhe) in the afternoon of 14/09 where both sides reportedly engaged heavy fighting. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG forces in Qansax Dheere in the morning of 15/09. The two sides exchanged gun fire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a hand grenade against an AMISOM convoy passing at Sarta Minashiibiyo area (Marka) in the afternoon of 16/09. Reports indicate that the convoy stopped following the blast and the attackers open fire at the forces before escaping. The AMISOM forces responded by firing towards to the attackers. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack AMISOM forces in Xawa Cabdi village around the noon hour. Al Shabaab was reported to have recovered several weapons. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked AMISOM forces in Buulo Mareer Village (29km SW of Marka) in the evening of 19/09. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launches an attack on AMISOM-Kenya forces in Badhaadhe Distirct, exact location not known. Two AMISOM deaths reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and- run attack against AMISOM base in Tayeeglow in the night of 22/09. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire that went on for about an hour, after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. A number of al Shabaab fighters were killed (no number provided) and one captured. AMISOMs casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab targets AMISOM-Kenya soldiers in Badhaadhe for the second time in two days. Two AMISOM vehicles were reportedly destroyed in the battle.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED targeted an AMISOM convoy in Buulo Jaan neighbourhood (Marka) in the afternoon of 23/09. AMISOM forces opened fire after the blast. The convoy was heading towards Ceel-Jaale (7km SW of Marka) when the incident happened. Two AMISOM soldiers were reportedly killed in the blast while a civilian was injured in the shooting. The perpetrator escaped.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM (ENDF)/SNG forces based in Ceel Garas (40km SE of Dhusamareeb) in the night of 24/09. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about an hour after which the attackers withdrew. Ten combatants were reportedly killed while unspecified numbers were injured. Following the clash Ethiopian forces killed two civilians, despite not believing they were associated with al Shabaab. The reasons for the violence against civilians are not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and attack against AMISOM (ENDF)/SNG forces based in Ceel Garas (40km SE of Dhusamareeb) on 25/09. Reports indicate that the two sides exchanged fire for about an hour after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against an AMISOM forces based at the Kismaayo airport in the evening of 27/09. Both sides exchanged gunfire for a few minutes after which the suspected al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED targeted AMISOM convoy in Ruusiya neighbourhood (Marka) in the afternoon of 30/09. Reports indicate that the forces open fire in response to the blast. The convoy was coming back from AMISOM base in Ceel-Haji when the incident happened. One civilian was killed, three others were injured and two shops were caught up by fire in the subsequent shooting while an AMISOM vehicle was damaged.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A group of al Shabaab fighters heavily armed launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Danow village (16km W of Marka) in the night of 30/09. Reports indicate that the two sides exchanged heavy gunfire which lasted for more than an hour. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Militia (Pro-Government)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters fired shots towards Waajid town in the night of 02/10 and withdrew quickly. AMISOM/pro-SNG forces did not respond to the shooting. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM/SNG forces convoy in Roobow Village (22km NE of Baraawe) in the night of 04/10. The two sides engaged in a gun-battle that lasted for about an hour after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Eleven al Shabaab fighters and two SNG soldiers were reportedly killed and a number of combatants injured. The convoy had left Bulo Mareer and was heading to Baraawe when the ambush took place.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: AMISOM and Juba forces overtake Buulo Gaduud from al Shabaab, killing 22. One Conflicting report: Hiiran Online reported no violence in the takeover.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters and AMISOM/SNG forces clashed in Baraawe a short while after the allied forces entered the town on foot in the morning of 06/10. SNG forces denied any clash with al Shabaab fighters in Baraawe but locals confirmed the fighting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: AMISOM/Jubaland forces on security operations, clashed with al Shabaab fighters in Yoontoy Yare Village (28km N of Kismaayo) in the morning of 06/10. Three Jubaland soldiers were reportedly killed and seven others wounded. AMISOM and al Shabaab casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM-Ethiopia and al Shabaab forces clash in Bulacle, outside of Dhuusamarreeb the evening of 06/10. The two hour battle caused 10 Ethiopian deaths according to the Somali Memo, which is pro-al Shabaab. Other reports do not confirm deaths.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Kenyan AMISOM forces kill a reported 60 members of al Shabaab and recovered five vehicles during a battle in Buulo Gaduud. The operation included a series of air strikes. The AMISOM effort was launched to liberate the area, which was ultimately successful.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: AMISOM and Jubaland forces clash with al Shabaab in Kamsuma, one al Shabaab member reported killing in the fighting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/SNAF position in Bullo Mareer on the 8/10. Both sides exchange heavy and light gun fire for around 20 minutes before al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Ceelasha Biyaaha (12km SE of Afgooye) in the night of 11/10. Both sides exchanged gunfire which lasted for about 25 minutes after which the al Shabaab attackers retreated back. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/Jubaland forces base in Bulo Gaduud (35km NE of Kismaayo) in the evening of 11/10. AMISOM forces responded with heavy gunfire which lasted 15 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Al Shabaab had recently lost control of the area to allied forces and were attempting to recover the area. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: AMISOM-Djibouti forces clash with al Shabaab for several hours in Bulo Burte. Causalities reported, numbers not known. Radio Andalus is pro-al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A group of al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM troops on foot patrol in Ruusiya neighbourhood (Marka) in the morning of 14/10. The attack started with hand grenade followed by gunshot which lasted for about an hour. Three AMISOM soldiers and a civilian bystander were killed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM (ENDF) convoy in Bulacle Village (30km SE of Dhusamareeb) in the evening of 15/10. The two sides have exchanged gunfire for about an hour after which the attackers withdrew. The AMISOM forces had left Dhusamareeb and were heading to Ceel Garas Village, when the ambush took place. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: A group of al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG positions in Rage-Ceele village (45km NE of Warsheikh) in the night of 15/10. The two sides engaged fighting for about 20 minutes after which the attackers. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Clashes between AMISOM-Ethiopia forces and al Shabaab erupts in Wabxo the night of 16/10 and lasts at least until the following afternoon. Officers who spoke for Al-Shabaab said that their fighters had taken control of most parts of Wabxo locality and that the fighting was continuing. Causalities not reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Ahmad Madobes militiamen (those loyal to southern Somalia regional administration) and al Shabaab clash in the village of Khaam Khaam, near Yoontoy Yarey. Casualties reported, though numbers were not provided. Later reports indicate the causality totals could be as high as 60 - Radio Al-Furqaan, which is pro-al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Clashes between AMISOM-Ethiopia forces and al Shabaab erupts in Wabxo the night of 16/10 and lasts at least until the following afternoon. Officers who spoke for Al-Shabab said that their fighters had taken control of most parts of Wabxo locality and that the fighting was continuing. Causalities not reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM (ENDF) in Waxbo Village (40km W of Ceel Buur) in the dawn of 17/10. The two sides engaged in a fierce fighting that went on for about four hours. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM (KDF) base in Bula Gudud (32km N of Kismaayo) in the evening of 17/10. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 10 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked AMISOM base near Kismaayo University in the evening of 17/10. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/Jubaland forces in Bula Gudud (32km N of Kismaayo) in the evening of 18/10. The two sides used both light and heavy gunfire. Three al Shabaab fighters were killed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Kenyan naval forces launch deck guns toward al Shabaab positions on Kudhaa Island causing 'deaths and injuries', the extent of which is not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: Hawadle militia ambushed AMISOM (Djiboutian contingent) convoy near Ceel Gaal Village (13km NE of Beled Weyne) in the morning of 19/10. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 15 minutes. One Hawadle militia was injured and another captured. The convoy had left Beled Weyne and was heading to Deefow to stop the fighting between Hawadle and Dir clan militias, when the ambush took place. The AMISOM convoy suspended their mission and returned to their base in Beled Weyne.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM (KDF) and Jubaland forces based in Bulo Gudud (32km N of Kismaayo) in the night of 22/10. The two sides used heavy and light weapons before the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Four al Shabaab

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against KDF/Jubaland forces based in Yoontoy Yare (27km N of Kismaayo) in the night of 22/10. Both sides engaged an extensive fighting after which the al Shabaab fighters withdraw. Causalities could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit-and-run attack against AMISOMs base in Buulo Mareer (29km SW of Marka) in the night of 23/10. The two sides used differently weaponry during the clash which lasted for about twenty minutes, after which the al Shabaab fighters withdraw. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: The joint SNG/Kenya Defence Forces (AMISOM) have killed more than 80 members of al-Shabaab in an offensive in Jamaame and Magambo areas near Kismaayo in Somalia.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: The joint SNG/Kenya Defence Forces (AMISOM) have killed more than 80 members of al-Shabaab in an offensive in Jamaame and Magambo areas near Kismaayo in Somalia.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters re-grouped themselves and attacked Jubaland forces in Abdale Birole, where both sides engaged heavy fighting which lasted throughout the day. Jubaland forces received re-enforcement from Kismaayo but were overwhelmed and al Shabaab fighters managed to re-take-over the village. At least 10 Jubaland forces were killed and one vehicle was captured by al Shabaab fighters. Casualties from al Shabaab fighters could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/SNG forces outpost in Embaresso neighbourhood (Marka) in the afternoon 25/10. Both sides exchanged gun-fire before al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Fighters loyal to Jubbaland administration backed by African Union troops have captured Kudhaa island in southern Somalia after heavy fighting with Al-Shabaab. The number of casualties still unknown but both sides suffered loses.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM (ENDF)/SNG forces based in Ceel Garas (39km SE of Dhusamareeb) in the night of 28/10. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about two hours after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Buulo Mareer (29km SW of Marka) in the night of 01/11. Exchange of gunfire between the two sides lasted for nearly ten minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Heavy fighting between Kenyan-AMISOM forces and al Shabaab causing causalities, numbers not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM (KDF) convoy in Yoontooy Village (30 Km N of Kismaayo) on 02/11. The ambush started with detonation of a RCIED planted on the road followed by an armed clash that went on for hours. Kenyan warplanes later supported the soldiers, forcing al Shabaab fighters to withdraw. Local media reported that 10 KDF soldiers were killed in the ambush.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out hit and run attack against AMISOM base in Qansaxdheere town in the evening of 02/11, both sides exchanged gunfire which lasted several minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Other reports indicate that al Shabaab fighters attacked the same AMISOM base again at around 22:00 by firing gunshots from a long distance. AMISOM forces responded with rounds of heavy artillery. Casualties on both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: SNG/AMISOM jointly attacked al Shabaab fighters based in Abooreey village (21km NE of Bulo Burte) in the morning of 06/11. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 30 minutes after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew and the joint forces took-over the village. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Ceelasha (12kms SE of Afgooye) in the night of 07/11. Both sides exchanged gunfire which lasted for about twenty minutes after which the al Shabaab attackers retreated. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in km 60 locality (27km NE of Marka) in the night of 07/11. Both sides exchanged gunfire for about fifteen minutes before the attackers withdrew from the scene. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against an AMISOM base in Mudul-Braawe, 5km NW of Baraawe town in the night of 10/11. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Ceel Haji (3km NE of Marka) after midnight in 10/11. The fighting started with several mortar rounds targeting AMISOM base followed by an armed confrontation. Both sides u

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Armed al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Carbiska (6km SE of Afgooye) after midnight on 10/11. Both sides exchanged gunfire for fifteen minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers, later identified as al Shabaab, hurled a hand grenade at AMISOM convoy in Ruusiya neighbourhood of Marka town in the afternoon of 10/11. AMISOM troops allegedly reacted by firing different types of gunfire including RPGs and Mortars and shelled different sections of the town. The shelling reportedly killed three civilians and injured unspecified number of people. Shops and residential homes were also destroyed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Sierra Leone)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack Sierra Leone-AMISOM forces in Tabta district, exact location not known. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces carry out an attack on Kenyan-AMISOM forces outside of Kismayo, exact location not known. Causalities not reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked AMISOM and Juba military forces in Baraawe on the evening of 13/11. A 'number' of allied combatants KIA, specific numbers not provided.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: A RCIED targeted AMISOM/SNG convoy near Roobow village (21km NE of Baraawe) in the morning of 13/11. Heavy exchange of gunfire reportedly followed the explosion which lasted for 15 minutes after which the attacker withdrew. The convoy was reportedly escorting General Mohamed Roble Jimaale aka 'Goobaale', the commander of SNG third brigade, who was on his way to Shalaambood from Baraawe. One military vehicle destroyed by the blast. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG forces positions in Baraawe in the night of 14/11. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 10 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attack Janaale, engage in battles with AMISOM on the evening of 16/11. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM/SNG forces in Buulo Mareer (29km SW of Marka) in the morning of 17/11. Two soldiers reported killed in the fighting (Somali Memo). Reliable sources said that Al-Shabab fighters seized most of Buulo Mareers neighbourhoods for hours as the [AMISOM] troops defended their bases. (Somali Memo)

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Ceelasha Biyaha settelement (12km SE of Afgooye) in the night of 18/11. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about ten minutes after which the al Shabaab attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Hawadle Clan Militia (Somalia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters and herders from Xawadle sub-clan clashed in Yasooman Village (30km NE of Bulo Burte) in the morning of 18/11. The fighting broke out after the pastoralists refused to pay Zakat demanded by the al Shabaab fighters. AMISOM (Djiboutian) backed the pastoralist during the clash. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM-Djibouti and SNG forces launched an offensive on the al Shabaab held town of Aborey, but are pushed back by its defenders. The Somali Memo, which is pro-al Shabaab, claimed the 'enemy' sustained causalities, but did not provide numbers.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM (ENDF) in Jeexin in the outskirts of Ceel Buur in the evening of 19/11. Two sides exchanged gunfire for about an hour after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM (ENDF) in Ceel Garas (40km SE of Dhusamareeb) in the evening of 19/11. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about an hour after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not b

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces base in Shalaambood (10km W of Marka) in the night of 22/11. The two sides engaged in a serious exchange of gun fire for a period of thirty minutes after which the al Shabaab attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG forces base in the western part of Buurdhuubo town in the evening of 27/11. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about half an hour after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties reported but 50 goats grazing near the scene were killed by stray bullets.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG forces in Qoryooley in the evening of 28/11. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces in Buulo Mareer (29km SW of Marka) in the evening of 28/11. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG base located near the airstrip in Garbahaarey in the evening of 29/11. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported. Al Shabaab fighters also fired two mortar rounds at the airstrip.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and run attack against AMISOM forces based in Lafoole settlement (7km SE of Afgooye) in the evening of 30/11. The two sides reportedly exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG forces in Gadoon Dhowe Village (40km SW of Beled Xawo) in the morning of 01/12. The two sides engaged in a fierce fighting that went on for four hours after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. The al Shabaab fighters reportedly destroyed an AMISOM military truck using a RPG round. Casualties are unknown. AMISOM/SNG seized the village from al Shabaab on 30/11.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces in Gubta neighbourhood on 02/12. The two sides exchanged fire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy in Aqabtalaal Village (50km NE of Baraawe) in the morning of 03/12. The attack started with a detonation of a RCIED against the convoy followed by a brief exchange of gunfire. No casualties reported.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and run attack on SNG/AMISOM forces base in the outskirts of Bulo Burte town in the evening of 5/12. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 40 minutes after which al Shabaab withdrew. One AMISOM/Djiboutian soldier was confirmed to have been killed in the clashes. Casualties from the al Shabaab side could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab carried out a hit-and-run attack against SNG/AMISOM forces based at Beled Weyne airstrip in the evening of 06/12. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 30 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack on AMISOM forces base in Ceel Haji (3km NE of Marka) in the night of 07/12. Both sides exchanged gunfire for about 20 minutes. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack on AMISOM forces base in Carbiska in Afgoye District in the evening of 07/12. Both sides exchanged heavy gunfire which lasted for about an hour. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack on SNG/AMISOM forces base in Siinka Dheer in Dharkenley District in the night of 09/12. Both sides exchanged gunfire for about few minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties from both sides are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Militias loyal to Barre Hiiraale reportedly opened fire at a warship believed to be a Kenyan that came close to Sabca Asharaf village near Goobweyn Village (14km, NE, Kismaayo) on 09/12. No casualties reported.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a hit and run attack on SNAF/AMISOM base in Qoryoley town in the night of 09/12. AL Shabaab fighters withdrew after a few minutes of confrontations between the two sides. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: SNG/AMISOM forces conducted a security operation in Ceel-Jaale village (7km SW of Marka) to arrest Habar Gidir militia who reportedly sell arms to al Shabaab fighters. The militia resisted arrest and clashed with the allied forces. Two militiamen were killed and 11 others arrested.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched a series of attacks on AMISOM bases in Marka during the late overnight hours. Causalities not known. It is not known if the attacks are in any response to AMISOM forces killing three civilians earlier in the day.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces in Ceel Garuun area near Lafoole (Afgooye District) in the night of 12/12. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against SNG/AMISOM forces in Arbacow (13km E of Afgooye) on the evening of 12/12. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG forces in Rage-Ceele Village (76km NE of Balcad) in the evening of 13/12. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire for more than one hour after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces in Siinaay neighbourhood in Waajid in the evening of 15/12. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG forces based at the western part of Bulo Burte in the evening of 16/12. The two side exchanged small arms fire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties from fighting reported, however five civilians have starved to death due to an ongoing al Shabaab blockade of the town.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM (KDF) in Tabta Village (75km SW of Afmadow) in the night of 16/12. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 30 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit-and-run attack AMISOM/SNG forces in Mundul Barawe settlement (Barawe District) in the night of 19/12/2014. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against SNG/AMISOM forces position in Baraawe in the night of 23/12. Reports indicate that the clash lasted more than an hour after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A group of al Shabaab fighters (8-10 members) launched a well-organized attack against AMISOM base in Mogadishu known as Xalane base, which is very close to Mogadishu International Airport in the afternoon of 25/12. The attackers were reportedly wearing SNA uniforms, initiated the attack with a hand grenade attack. They managed to breach the base camp and attempted to gain access to critical infrastructure. It took AMISOM soldiers more than 18 hours to clear the compound. Al Shabaab claimed responsibility for the attack as soon as the first shots rang out and later broadcasted that they had killed 17 AMISOM soldiers, including senior AMIOSM commanders and two white mercenaries. AMISOM said that they lost five soldiers and one of their contractors in the attack. The number of al Shabaab killed in the attack were not reported upon, though it was later learned at least some were killed as AMISOM forces later publicly displayed the bodies of the enemy dead as an act of discouragement for future attacks. A press release reportedly issued by the al Shabaab, claimed the operation was in revenge for the killing of the al Shabaab leader, Ahmed Aw Godane alias Mukhtar Abu Zubeyr and other Muslims killed in Somalia.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Ceel Saliini (30km SW of Afgooye) in the night of 25/12. The fighting lasted for about two hours. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed SNG/AMISOM (Djibouti) forces near Jimbiley Village (10km NW of Jalalaqsi) on the road between Jalalaqsi and Bulo Burte on 29/12. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Three SNG soldiers were injured and a number of al Shabaab fighters killed. The convoy was also targeted with a RCIED but casualties could not be established; al Shabaab claimed have had killed a SNG commander. The allied forces were on an operation aimed at opening the road between the two towns following an al Shabaab economic blockade.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out an ambush against AMISOM/SNG forces near Buur Weyn village (29km S of Buulo Burte) in the morning of 01/01. The ambush followed by exchange of gunfire between the two sides. The allied forces were escorting convoy of vehicles transporting food aid from Jalalaqsi to Buulo Burte when the ambush happened. One al Shabab fighter was reportedly killed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/Jubaland forces in Goob Weyn (13km NE of Kismaayo) in the evening of 01/01. Both sides briefly clashed after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
