NOTES: Al Shabaab and AMISOM-Kenya clash in Yoontoy Yarey, causalities not known. The fighting started when Al-Shabaab fighters launched an attack against Kenyan troops convoy in the area.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and run attack against KDF convoy heading to a water point near Raas Kambooni village (78kms SW of Badhaadhe) in the morning of 02/01. Both sides exchanged gunfire which lasted for a few minutes after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Three AMISOM-KDF soldiers were reportedly injured. Casualties from al Shabaab side could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM/SNG forces escorting food convoy near Yasooman village (30km NE of Bulo Burte) in the afternoon of 03/01. The convoy was heading to Maxaas from Bulo Burte. The fighting lasted for about 20 minutes after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported. Yasooman proper had been taken over by SNG forces earlier in the day.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: SNG forces attacked al Shabaab fighters in the outskirts of Hunyaley/Lugay Weene (13km E of Xudur) in the afternoon of 05/01. Both sides engaged in a heavy fighting which lasted for about three hours after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew following reports of immediate reinforcement from AMISOM/ENDF forces based in Xudur. Reports indicate that 11 al Shabaab fighters were killed while 4 SNG forces were injured. One of the al Shabaab fighters killed in the attack - who hails from Rahanweyn/Luways sub clan - was said to be known for planning the hit and run attacks against SNG forces in the town.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked AMISOM base in Mariin-Gubaay (48km NE of Baraawe) in the morning of 05/11. The fighting lasted for about ten minutes after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM-SNG forces attack several al Shabaab locations east of Xudur, including: Ceel Xagar, Abaq Beedeey, Laan Xabag, Kuunyaaley, and Ceel Mareer. Allied forces have declared they have taken control of the villages. Fifteen combatants dead, plus injures.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM convoy at Hawinaa near Tabta village (78km SW of Afmadow) in the evening of 06/01. Both sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew. The convoy was heading to Dhobley when the incident happened. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Ceelasha (12km SE of Afgooye) in the night of 10/01. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM forces based in Ceel Saliini (Ceel Shiikh) Village (32km SW of Afgooye) in the evening of 11/01. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 20 minutes. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Well-armed al Shabaab fighters launched three consecutive attacks against AMISOM base in Baraawe in the night of 12/01. Reports indicate that the gunfire was heard up to 03:00 morning. Both sides have reportedly received casualties but exact figures are currently unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM (ENDF) convoy on its way from Buur Hakaba to Baidoa in Ugaari Village (11k NW of Buur Hakaba) in the afternoon of 18/01. After a brief exchange of gunfire, the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Three ENDF soldiers were injured during the attack. The Hormuud telecommunication network was switched from Baidoa immediately after the start of the attack and was only restored after the convoy had reached Baidoa.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM base in Arbacoow neighbourhood in Ceelasha Settlement (12km SE of Afgooye) in the morning of 18/01. The sounds of heavy gunfire including anti-aircraft fire could be heard from the area around the time of dawn prayer. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM troops in Ceelasha shelled al Shabaab hide-outs in the southern direction of Laantabuur (12km SW of Afgooye) in the early morning of 19/01. Reports indicate that al Shabaab fighters were regrouping in the area to launch an attack against AMISOM positions in Ceelasha or Afgooye town. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM (ENDF) convoy in Ceel Lahelay Village (20km NW of Ceel Buur) in the evening of 21/01. The two sides exchanged in gunfire for about 30 minutes after which attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown. The convoy left Dhusamareeb and was heading to Ceel Buur when they got ambushed. ENDF/SNG forces conducted a joint security operation the following morning in the village and arrested a number of people they suspected of links with al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM (ENDF) base in the outskirts of Ceel Buur in the night of 28/01. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 20 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: SNG backed by AMISOM forces capture the al Shabaab held areas of Jana Cabdalle and Far Waamo following 'heavy fighting.' Casualties, precise date not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: SNG backed by AMISOM forces capture the al Shabaab held areas of Jana Cabdalle and Far Waamo following 'heavy fighting.' Casualties, precise date not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out an attack against AMISOM base near Yaaq Biri Weyne Village (22km W of Wanla Weyne) in the night of 31/01. Al Shabaab claimed that they had killed a number of AMISOM soldiers. However, the casualties could not be independently verified.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM in Ceelasha settlement (Afgooye District) in the night of 31/01. After ten minutes of fire exchange, the attackers withdraw. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed a KDF convoy on the road between Tabta and Bilis Qoqani (about 64km SE of Dhoobley) in Afmadow District in the morning of 31/01. The two sides used heavy weapons fire but casualties could not be confirmed. A private mini-bus, which was stopped at the same time by AMISOM for search, was caught up in the fight and got destroyed. Two of the four passengers in the mini-bus, managed to escape and reached Bilis Qoqani safely while the fate of the other two is unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: Heavy fighting broke out between al Shabaab fighters and AMISOM (KDF)/Jubaland forces in Yoontoy Yare (27km NE of Kismaayo) in the afternoon of 02/02. AMISOM (KDF) called for air support which later destroyed al Shabaab camp in the village. The village is divided by River Juba, on the east side is under al Shabaab control while Jubaland camp on western side. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Ceelasha (12km SE of Afgooye) in the night of 02/02. The fighting lasted for about fifteen minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces base in Ceel-Cadde Village (52km SW of Garbahaarey) in the night of 04/02. The two sides engaged in a fierce fighting lasted for about an hour after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a hand grenade at AMISOM military convoy in Ruusiya neighbourhood in Marka on the morning of 06/02. AMISOM forces opened fire after the blast. A civilian was reportedly wounded in the shooting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Ceel Saliini (Ceel Shiikh) Village (32km SW of Afgooye) in the night of 06/02. The fighting lasted for more than thirty minutes. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An AMISOM convoy transporting logistics travelling from Waajid back to Rabdhure fell into an al Shabaab ambush in Boodaan Village (24km SE of Rabdhure) on 09/02. The two sides engaged in a brief heavy fighting after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Two al Shabaab fighters were killed in the clash. AMISOM casualties could not be established. Hormuud telecommunication network was switched off by AMISOM to ensure safe passage of the convoy.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM forces near Aleemow Village (18km NE of Waajid) in the afternoon of 09/02. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported. The AMISOM forces had left Waajid to receive an AMISOM convoy that had come from Ethiopia.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against SNG/AMISOM position in the eastern side of Xudur in the evening of 09/02. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Mudul-Braawe (5km NW of Baraawe) in the night of 10/02. The two sides exchanged gunfire for more than thirty minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Lafoole area (6km SE of Afgooye) in the night of 10/02. The two sides exchanged gunfire for fifteen minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy in Laanta Garaska Village (7kms N of Waajid) in the afternoon of 11/02. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. One al Shabaab fighter was killed. No casualty was reported from the AMISOM side. The convoy reached Waajid after an hour.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy in Boodaan Village (24km SE of Rabdhure) in the afternoon of 11/02. The ambush started with a detonation of a RCIED that hit an AMISOM vehicle. The two sides then engaged in a heavy fighting that lasted for about an hour after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Reports indicate that 11 al Shabaab fighters and eight (unconfirmed) AMISOM soldiers including three female soldiers were killed in the clash. Further reports indicate that AMISOM forces killed a number of civilians in the vicinity of the scene of the clash. Hormuud telecommunication network in Rabdhure, Ceel Barde and Waajid is back to operational following three days of switch off due to AMISOM convoys movement.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: At least ten Al-Shabaab militants were killed and scores of others injured early 11/02 in heavy fighting between AMISOM forces and the Al- Qaida affiliated militant group in southern Somalias Barawe town.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED targeted AMISOM soldiers on foot patrol in the vicinity of Ruusiya (Marka) in the morning of 12/02. After the explosion, AMISOM soldiers converged to collect their casualties but a number of hand grenades (5 to 6) were hurled against them. The AMISOM soldiers opened fire in all directions after the grenade attack. The exact number of AMISOM casualties could not be established. Civilian casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM/SNG convoy in Garas Kuunye located on the road between Mooda Moode Village and Buur Hakaba in the morning of 14/02. Mooda Mooda Village is about (34 Km NW) of Buur Hakaba. The two sides engaged in a heavy fighting that lasted for about an hour after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Two al Shabaab fighters were killed. Casualties on the AMISOM/SNG could not be established. SNG forces took the two bodies to Baidoa and displayed them in front of the police station.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and -run attack against AMISOM/Jubaland forces in the outskirts of Afmadow in the evening of 14/02. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire for about ten minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported. SNG forces cut off the telecommunication the following day reportedly to investigate the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al-Shabaab forces in Bay region ambushed an Ethiopian-AMISOM military convoy on the outskirts of Buur Hakaba district on 14 February. The attack resulted in the death of one Ethiopian soldier.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: At least ten people were killed after al Shabaab ambushed an Ethiopian-African Union forces convoy, prompting a heavy fighting between the two sides. Causalities were reported, though the numbers are unknown. Residents in the town of Rab Dhuure reported that Ethiopian troops who suffered causalities from the attack have killed pastoralists in revenge for the attack by militants, killing ten civilians.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces reportedly fired numerous numbers of mortar rounds against al Shabaab hideouts between Gandarshe (31km SW of Afgooye) and K60 villages along Afgooye-Marka road in the morning of 16/02. Reports indicate that al Shabaab fighters vacated Gandarshe village immediately after the shelling started. Further reports indicate AMISOM forces clashed with al Shabaab fighters near Ceel-Saliini village not far from Gandarshe. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces reportedly fired numerous numbers of mortar rounds against al Shabaab hideouts between Gandarshe (31km SW of Afgooye) and K60 villages along Afgooye-Marka road in the morning of 16/02. Reports indicate that al Shabaab fighters vacated Gandarshe village immediately after the shelling started. Further reports indicate AMISOM forces clashed with al Shabaab fighters near Ceel-Saliini village not far from Gandarshe. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Ceelasha Biyaaha (12km SE of Afgooye) in the night of 17/02. The fighting lasted for about fifteen minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters briefly attacked AMISOM/KDF based at Kismayo airport. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy in the vicinity of Wareer Maleh Village (37km NE of Baraawe) in the morning of 25/02. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. The convoy came from Baraawe and was heading towards Buulo Mareer when the incident happened. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit-and-run attack against SNG/AMISOM forces in Qansax Dhere town in the night of 27/02. A pro-al Shabaab website reported that al Shabaab fighters attacked the town from different directions and engaged in a fierce fighting with the allied forces. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Somali military based in Wajid went on security operation and an armed clash started in the morning of 27/2 with suspected al Shabaab fighters in Baar, 16 KM NW of Wajid. Both sides are engaging in heavy fighting and the fight is still on-going. ENDF is firing heavy artillery from their position in Wajid to the area but otherwise are not involved. So far two SNGF (Jiron) have been reportedly killed but casualties can increase.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM (ENDF) convoy in an area between Leego Village and Buur Hakaba town in the afternoon of 28/02. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an ENDF convoy in the vicinity of Gasarla (8km SE of Baidoa) in the afternoon of 01/03. The clash started with a RCIED explosion and was followed by a fierce fighting. At least seven ENDF soldiers were reportedly injured in the clash while casualties from al Shabaab could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militia carried out hit and run attack against ENDF based in the outskirt of Ceel Bur in the night of 03/03. The two sides have exchange gunfire that lasted for about 30 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM base at the western outskirts of Bulo Burte town on 04/03. Reports indicate that PKM and small arms fire was used by the attackers, who withdrew after a short period. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks AMISOM-ENDF forces in Qansadheer. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: On the night of 7 March, [al Shabaab] units attacked a base housing Ethiopian troops and government militias in Suuqa Xoolaha area in Baydhabo town. Heavy fighting erupted between [al Shabaab] and the government forces following the attack. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks AMISOM-ENDF forces on the outskirts of Goof Guduud on the evening of 07/03. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against an AMISOM convoy in Wareer Maleh (38km NE of Baraawe) in the morning of 08/03. Both sides exchanged gunfire after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported and the

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNG forces positions in Xudur in the night of 08/03. The al Shabaab fighters opened fire indiscriminately towards the town and disappeared. AMISOM/SNG forces responded but no casualties were reported on both sides.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Fighting reported between al Shabaab and AMISOM-Kenya forces at a waterhole outside of Kismayo on 10/03. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed SNG/ENDF convoy in Oodweyn Village (26km NW of Ceel Buur) in the night of 12/03. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire for about an hour after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown. The convoy had left Ceel Buur and was heading to Dhusamareeb when the ambush took place.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a complex attack against the ISWA Presidential Palace in the morning of 12/03. Three armed men dressed in SNAF military uniform driving a NOAH car approached a SNG position near Hotel Eden in Howlwadaag neighbourhood, got off the car, walked towards the ENDF checkpoint located at the gate of the presidential compound where ISWA president Sharif Hassan lives and killed two Ethiopian soldiers. Galayr security Manager, his driver and a British-Somali from Taskforce who were at the checkpoint to access their office were wounded in the attack. The three al Shabaab fighters who almost passed the checkpoint were shot and killed by other AMISOM soldiers who were attracted by the gunshots. The vehicle was arrested by Police and the police commander ordered to drive it away, suspecting that it could carry explosives. A well-known driver agreed to do it and drove it towards Al-amxaar check-point, 4kms north of Baidoa town. He got off and warned the people. Two SNGF soldiers there convinced him that they should search the car. During the search, the vehicle exploded, killing the three of them. Latest reports on 13/03 indicate that AMISOM (ENDF) took the driver of the VBIED from the police station in Baidoa to their base for interrogation. The suspected al Shabaab driver was arrested before his explosive-laden vehicle was driven out of the town by a civilian driver where it exploded.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM/SNG forces in Birta Dheer (15km SE of Garbahaarey) in the morning of 12/03. The two sides engaged in a heavy fighting which lasted for more than an hour after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. The joint forces were reportedly transferring new AMISOM soldiers to Buur Dhuubo when the incident happened. Three SNG forces and seven al Shabaab fighters were reportedly killed in the clashes

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against SNG/AMISOM forces positions in Goof-Gaduud Shabeelow village (25Km SW of Baidoa) in the evening of 14/03. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked three ENDF pick-up trucks travelling from Ceel Barde to Ted in Banbar (16km NE of Ceel Barde) in the morning of 15/03. Both sides exchanged gunfire and the ENDF forces continued their journey without stopping. One al Shabaab fighter was reported injured in the clashes. No other casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM convoy in Yoontoy Yarey (25km NE of Kismaayo) in the afternoon of 17/03. One AMISOM soldier and four al Shabaab fighters were reportedly killed while two AMISOM soldiers were injured in the attack. An AMISOM vehicle was also damaged by RPG round. No civilian casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM/SNG forces convoy travelling from Beled Weyn to Bulo Burte in Raangaabo village (34km SW of Beled Weyn) in the afternoon of 19/03. The two sides exchange gunfire after the ambush which lasted for about 30 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. An AMISOM soldier and three SNG were injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed the same AMISOM/SNG forces convoy heading to Bulo Burte in Misko-Shiid village (50km S of Beled Weyne) in the evening of 19/03. The two sides briefly exchange gunfire before al Shabaab fighters withdrew. An SNG soldier was reportedly injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against an AMISOM base located around the port and the police station area in the morning of 19/3. Both sides exchanged gunfire for about one hour after which the al Shabaab attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack AMISOM forces outside of Beled Weyne in a location known as Raandaabo on the evening of 19/03. There were two waves of attacks. Vehicles reported destroyed, casualties not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried an ambush against AMISOM/SNG forces convoy passing in Haraale village (56km NE of Bulo Burte) in the morning of 20/03. Reports indicate that the ambush was followed by heavy armed clash that lasted around two hours after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. This is the third time either al Shabaab fighters or suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed the same convoy. Eleven al Shabaab fighters and five SNG soldiers were killed while 15 more from both sides were injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attacker(s) hurled a hand grenade at AMISOM convoy passing in the vicinity of Ruusiya neighbourhood (Marka) in the afternoon of 23/03. The AMISOM forces open fire after the blast. The device damaged a water browser. Two civilian bystanders were killed in the subsequent shooting.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Jubaland and AMISOM-Kenya forces oust al Shabaab forces from Yoontoy Yarey following a fighting on 27/03. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in near the seaport (Marka) in the night of 28/03. The fighting lasted for about half an hour after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED targeted an AMISOM convoy in Buulo Jan neighbourhood (Marka) in the afternoon of 29/03. The device reportedly hit one of the AMISOM vehicles. AMISOM forces opened gunfire indiscriminately in response to the attack. The AMISOM forces later conducted a security operation, arrested five armed militiamen and seized a number of explosives devices. The militiamen (Biimaal) were later released after SWIA ministers requested AMISOM forces to release them. Both AMISOM and civilian casualties were confirmed but the exact figures are currently unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a hand grenade at AMISOM soldiers on foot patrol in Ruusiya neighbourhood (Marka) in the afternoon of 31/03. AMISOM fighters opened gunfire after the blast. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a hand grenade against AMISOM convoy in the vicinity of Sheikh Abrone neighbourhood (Marka) in the morning of 04/04. AMISOM forces opened fire after the blast. One civilian bystander was reportedly injured in the shooting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: RCIED targeted an AMISOM convoy in the vicinity of Baar Ismail checkpoint (Afgooye) in the morning of 06/04. AMISOM forces opened gunfire after the blast. Another IED was found near the scene of the blast and was later disabled.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: On 7 April, [al Shabaab] forces in Galguduud region heavily attacked bases belonging to Ethiopian forces in Ceelbuur town. Reports say that [al Shabaab] inflicted heavy casualties (numbers not known) on the enemy forces. Radio Andalus is pro al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED was targeted against AMISOM convoy in the vicinity of Garasbaaley (Hodan District) in the evening of 08/04. The RCIED hit one of the AMISOM vehicles. AMISOM forces opened gunfire after the blast. Casualties could not be established. The perpetrator(s) escaped.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces attacked al Shabaab fighters near Wareer Maleh Village (39km NE of Baraawe) in the morning of 11/04. One al Shabaab fighter was killed in the clash. The AMISOM forces seized nine sets of SNG army uniforms.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters and ENDF clashed near Korow-Rooge Village (15km SE of Baidoa) in the morning of 17/04. The fighting started after al Shabaab fighters ambushed an ENDF military convoy travelling between Daynuunay Village and Baidoa town. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: AMISOM (KDF) contingent conducted attacked al Shabaab base in Gheldezza area (90km SW of Afmadow) in the afternoon of 18/04. Reports indicate that 12 al Shabaab fighters were killed and their weapons seized. Three KDF soldiers were killed and seven others injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters opened fire using small guns towards new Kismaayo airport from north-eastern direction of the airport in the evening of 19/04. AMISOM/KDF responded by opening fire in the direction of the attackers. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM/ENDF convoy in Gasarla (8km SE of Baidoa) in the afternoon of 19/04. Reports indicate that the convoy was returning from Buur Hakaba when the ambush happened. The telecommunication network was switched off during the attack. Three al Shabaab fighters were killed and two others were injured. Injured AMISOM soldiers were evacuated to Baidoa.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM military convoy travelling between Leego (49km E of Buur Hakaba) and Bali-Doogle Airport (13km NW of Wanla Weyn) in the morning of 19/04. The ambush started with RCIED explosion followed by direct confrontation between the two sides. Two AMISOM soldiers were killed while 12 others were injured. Casualties from al Shabaab side could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/SNG forces based in Ceel Buur in the night of 25/04. Both sides exchanged gun-fire for around 20 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not been established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM/SNG forces convoy in Abaq Beeday village (16km E of Xudur) along the main road between Xudur and Tayeeglow in the afternoon of 25/04. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about 20 minutes after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties on both sides could not be established while AMISOM forces have so far not confirmed the ambush.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: A RCIED targeted AMISOM (KDF) convoy in Gosay area - a grazing land - (38km SW of Afmadow) in the afternoon of 28/04. An AMISOM (KDF) truck was damaged at the rear part by the blast. The forces open fire after the explosion. No casualties were reported both the explosion and the subsequent shooting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED was targeting AMISOM convoy in the vicinity of Ceelasha (12km SE of Afgooye) in the morning of 06/05. The RCIED hit one of the AMISOM vehicles. AMISOM forces reportedly opened gunfire after the blast while they also closed the road and denied civilian access for some hours. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED targeted an AMISOM convoy passing near Rage-Ceele (45km NE of Warsheikh) in the morning of 06/05 which was followed by brief exchange of gunfire. One AMISOM soldier was reportedly killed in the crossfire.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM/ENDF convoy was ambushed by suspected al Shabaab fighters in Korow Rooge (15km SE of Baidoa) around midday of 07/05 from al Shabaab fighters. During the ambush, no casualties were reported and al Shabaab fighters withdrew immediately. ENDF forces started a security operation and arrested 25 people from the village and took them to Baidoa for further investigation but it is not clear if the arrested people are normal villagers or al Shabaab affiliates. AMISOM convoys are regularly ambushed by al Shabaab fighters on the road between Baidoa and Buur Hakaba.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Ceelasha (12km SE of Afgooye) in the evening of 09/05. Both sides exchanged gunfire briefly after that the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Joint AMISOM/SNGF forces on security operation have arrested an al Shabaab fighter in Caday, 15 KM SE of Ceel Buur in the evening of 09/05. The man, said to hail from Murusade sub-clan was transferred to Ceel Buur main base for further interrogation. During the arrest, two other al Shabaab fighters were killed by the forces.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed an ENDF convoy heading from Rabdhuure to Wajiid in Waab Giraad village, 54 KM SE of Yeed in the morning of 09/05. Both sides engaged in an armed clash and used small arms fire and heavy weapons. One ENDF track was destroyed after it was hit by a RPG. Al Shabaab retreated from the scene. Fifteen al Shabaab fighters were killed and eighteen others injured. The casualty from ENDF sides cannot be established. A military helicopter landed on the site after the fighting ceased and al Shabaab was repelled from the area presumably collecting injured ENDF soldiers. Around 12:00 the same convoy was ambushed again by al Shabaab at War Dhujiiley village, 55 KM SE of Yeed. Both sides briefly exchange small arms fire and two al Shabaab were reportedly killed in this incident. Al Shabaab were repelled and retreated from the area. The convoy proceeded to Buur Dhuxunley village, 59 KM SE of Yeed. The telecommunication was switched off during the incident.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed an ENDF convoy heading from Rabdhuure to Wajiid in Waab Giraad village, 54 KM SE of Yeed in the morning of 09/05. Both sides engaged in an armed clash and used small arms fire and heavy weapons. One ENDF track was destroyed after it was hit by a RPG. Al Shabaab retreated from the scene. Fifteen al Shabaab fighters were killed and eighteen others injured. The casualty from ENDF sides cannot be established. A military helicopter landed on the site after the fighting ceased and al Shabaab was repelled from the area presumably collecting injured ENDF soldiers. Around 12:00 the same convoy was ambushed again by al Shabaab at War Dhujiiley village, 55 KM SE of Yeed. Both sides briefly exchange small arms fire and two al Shabaab were reportedly killed in this incident. Al Shabaab were repelled and retreated from the area. The convoy proceeded to Buur Dhuxunley village, 59 KM SE of Yeed. The telecommunication was switched off during the incident.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM/ENDF on security operation clashed briefly with al Shabaab fighters in Abow Casharow, 5 KM south of Baidoa town on the 10/05. Two al Shabaab fighters were killed and a third one was wounded. Al Shabaab fighters immediately retreated.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed and attacked an AMISOM/KDF convoy in Hawindha (93 KM SW of Afmadow, on the road between Dhoobley and Tabta) in the afternoon of 16/05. Casualties are unknown but the convoy managed only to reach Dhoobley around 19:00 pulling two damaged military vehicles and one damaged Pro-Box civilian vehicle which was previously car-jacked by al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED explosion targeting AMISOM convoy took place in Abroone neighbourhood of Marka town in the afternoon of 17/05/2015. The AMISOM convoy opened indiscriminate gunfire after the blast but causalities could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Ceelasha (12km SE of Afgooye) in the night of 18/05. Both sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. No casualties reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters targeted an Ethiopian Military convoy with an IED explosion in Mooda-Mooda village (25 KM SE) of Baidoa in the midday of 22/05 before an armed clash erupted between the two sides. One al Shabaab fighters was reported killed and another wounded while one solider was injured from the Ethiopian side, and an Ethiopian military vehicle got slightly damaged, the network was off during the convoy movement.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Kenyan AMISOM soldiers kill seven members of al Shabaab in the southern town of Dobley.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: An Ethiopian military convoy passing near Mooda-Mooda Village (25km SE of Baidoa) was targeted with an IED explosion in the morning of 25/05. The Ethiopian forces responded with gunfire, killing a civilian in the area. Casualties from the Ethiopian military could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM convoy 10km N of Mahadaay in the morning of 28/05. Both sides exchanged heavy gunfire for a while after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. The convoy came from Mahadaay and was heading to Jalaqasi when the incident happened. The convoy preceded the trip after the attack. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ACTOR2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Beled Xawo District administration forces clashed with KDF forces in Beled Xawo over a border dispute on the 29/05. The clash started when Kenyan forces started destroying buildings on the Somali and Kenya border, Kenyan government is seemingly trying to construct a wall on the border between Somalia and Kenya starting from Mandera. The two sides exchanged a brief gunfire and a gun was taken from KDF side though it was returned to them after reconciliatory talks between two sides. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A vehicle transporting sugar from Kismaayo to Kenya was targeted with an IED in Hosingo village (97KM, NW of Badhaadhe District). The destroyed vehicle was part of a convoy that left the city of Kismaayo on 31/05. Resident reported that al Shabaab attacked JLF and AMISOM troops who reached the area to rescue the vehicle. No human casualties reported so far.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED was targeted a group of AMISOM soldiers on foot patrol in the vicinity of Ruusiya neighbourhood (Marka) in the morning of 04/06. The device missed its target. An AMISOM fuel tanker reportedly passed before the incident happened. AMISOM forces opened gunfire indiscriminately in response to the blast. Two civilian bystanders were killed in the shooting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched hit-and-run attack against AMISOM positions in Tortoorow Village (49km NW of Afgooye) in the night of 05/06. Both sides exchanged gunfire for fifteen minutes after which the attackers withdrew. No reports on casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a hand grenade against AMISOM forces on foot patrol in Sheekh Abroone neighbourhood (Marka) in the morning of 07/06. AMISOM forces opened gunfire to different directions after the blast. A young civilian male was killed in the AMISOM shooting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Somali National Army together with AMISOM forces launched an attack against al Shabaab hideout in the outskirts of Tortoorow Village (49km NW of Afgooye) in the morning of 07/06. There was heavy exchange of different types of gunfire before the al Shabaab fighters retreated. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched hit-and-run attack against AMISOM/SNA positions in Tortoorow (49km NW of Afgooye) in the night of 08/06. The fighting started with several mortar rounds fired by al Shabaab fighters before the armed clash started. The fighting lasted for few minutes after which the al Shabaab attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM/ENDF convoy, heading from Leego to Buur-Hakaba in Jameeco Cabdi-Guray in the evening of 11/06. Heavy fighting broke out between the sides which lasted for some hours. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks a AMISOM-Djibouti base in Buurhakaba on 11/06. Heavy gunfire could be heard in various areas in Beled Weyne. The fighting occurred late in the night. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against an AMISOM outpost on the western side of Belet Weyne town in the night of 12/06. Reports indicate that the suspected al Shabaab fighters arrived in vehicles and started firing at the AMISOM base. There was a brief exchange of gun fire and the attackers escaped. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: A public mini-bus, prepared as a VBIED rammed into AMISOM/ENDF forces supply vehicle across the bridge of Buur-Hakaba in the morning of 12/06. AMISOM/ENDF was on their way to re-enforce their troops which came under attack the previous evening in Jameeco Cabdi-Guray. Unverified sources indicate that one supply lorry burned down and the number of casualties could not be confirmed. Telecommunication was switched off during the incident.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM/ENDF launched an attack against an al Shabaab position in Daanjeeri village (23 KM NE of Buur-Hakaba on 15/06. Both sides engaged in heavy fighting before al Shabaab fighters retreated from the village. Casualties on both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM/ENDF convoy coming from Xudur in Kulunjerer (39 KM NE of Wajiid) on 15/06. Both sides engaged in heavy fighting before al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties on both sides are unknown as the communication network was switched off. The convoy continued towards Wajiid.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM position in Hawl Wadaag section of Belet Weyn in the night of 17/06. The gun fire exchange lasted for around 10 minutes before al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: A vehicle laden with explosive devices driven by a suicide bomber hit the wall of Cadaado conference hall in the morning of 18/06, where clan representatives and several political stakeholders are holding talks for the creation of Central State. Subsequently, three armed men tried to break in to the hall. The SNG security forces and AMISOM (ENDF) guarding the conference managed to kill all the three before they reach the conference hall. Al Shabaab claimed responsibility for the attack through Somalimemo.net, a pro-al Shabaab web based media outlet. Further reports suggest that three SNG soldiers were also killed in the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Heavily armed al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM forces based in the outskirt of Buulo Mareer town (29km SW of Marka) in the night of 20/06. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: SNGF with support of allies conducted a security operation in Baardheere (Gedo Region) on 21/06. According to sources, the operation was opened with one air missile, hitting the police station in Baardheere town. SNG Special Forces were dropped by helicopters/planes and started their assault on an al Shabaab position. Heavy weapons were deployed and around 8 al Shabaab members were killed and another ten wounded. After the assault, Special Forces were picked again by helicopter/plane and returned to their base. In this surprise attack, no SNGF casualties were reported. Unconfirmed reports indicate that at least four high ranking al Shabaab senior members were killed although no al Shabaab bodies or injured were taken away by plane. (Sheik Fidow, Barre Qooje, Sheik Shacir and Abu Daaud, Senior al Shabaab members were supposedly killed).

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militants attacked Kenyan convoy transporting food and logistic to Kenyan troops based in Ceel Cade (96 km SW of Belet-Xawo), the military convoy crossed from the Kenyan boarder into Somalia. Al Shabaab attack started with a land mine device followed by exchange of gunfire between al Shabaab and the KDF convoy. Reports say that one of the military vehicles was hit by the explosion and resulted in the death of 10 soldiers.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Qoryooley in the night of 24/06. Both sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. No reports on casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Burundi)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Government of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a complex attack against AMISOM/Burundian base in Leego (49 KM SE of Buur-Hakaba) in the morning of 26/06. According to first reports, the attack started with a massive SVBIED and was followed by armed gun men who fought their way inside the camp and took it over. AMISOM re-enforcement is said to be on the way. Fifty AMISOM casualties reported as well as the capture and beheading of a government official (Shabelle Media Network).

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out an attack against AMISOM forces base in Tortoorow Village (49km NW of Afgooye) in the night of 27/06. The clash between the warring sides lasted for more than ten minutes before the attackers retreated back. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces based in Mudul-Braawe (5km NW of Baraawe) in the night of 27/06. Both sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces base in Lafoole (6km SE of Afgooye) in the night of 28/06. Both sides exchanged gunfire for not less than one hour after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Armed al Shabaab fighters launched attack against AMISOM/SNA positions in Mahadaay (21 KM NE of Jowhar) in the night of 05/07. The attackers managed to enter into the town but after almost one hour of gun fire exchange they were pushed back by AMISOM and SNA forces. Casualties from both sides are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab shot and killed an ENDF defector, who was previously shown to the public in Ufurow in Hubay (30 KM south of Qansax Dheere on 06/07. The reason is unclear but some sources indicate that he was shot after he tried to escape from al Shabaab forces.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a hand grenade against a group of AMISOM soldiers on foot patrol in the vicinity of Sheekh Abroone in the morning of 07/07. AMISOM forces responded with gunfire and immediately conducted security operation in the neighbourhood. A large number of people were arrested during the operation. One civilian was killed by AMISOM forces who said she was intending to throw another hand grenade at them and two other civilian bystanders were wounded by stray bullets.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled two hand grenades against AMISOM forces on foot patrol inside Marka town in the morning of 11/07. AMISOM forces responded with gunfire to different directions after the blast. Confirmed reports indicate that AMISOM forces entered a mosque (Al-Raxmah) and killed the imam and his assistant inside the mosque. The indiscriminate gunfire opened by AMISOM forces also injured six civilians. Tensions turned high and people took the streets of Marka to show their anger against AMISOM forces behaviour towards the civilians. The demonstrators were burning tyres and they had slogans saying AMISOM has to leave. The demonstration was continuing until 15:00.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an ENDF supply convoy in Boodaan (50 KM SE of Yeed) on 11/07. Both sides exchange small arms fire and RPGs. Casualties from the incident is not yet known as the telecommunication network in the area including Wajid town is switched off for the last two days.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces based in Ceel-Jaale (7km SW of Marka) and SNA forces collided mistakenly after the AMISOM forces thought that the SNA forces were al Shabaab fighters. The SNA forces came from Shalaambood and they were heading to Marka when the incident happened. Two SNA soldiers were killed and five others were injured. One of the SNA vehicles was also damaged.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Nov 7. Unidentified attackers hurled two hand grenades against AMISOM forces on foot patrol inside Marka town in the morning. AMISOM forces responded with gunfire to different directions after the blast.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters and allied forces clashed briefly in Buur Dhuxunle, (60 KM SE of Yeed) on 12/07. After exchange of gun-fire, al Shabaab fighters escaped. One civilian was killed in the exchange and 2 SNGF were injured. After the attack, ENDF/SNG also left the town.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an ENDF convoy in War Dhujiiley (56 KM SE of Yeed) on 13/07. Both sides exchanged small arms fire before al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Two civilians were killed and 2 SNGF were injured during the fight.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/SNGF base in Bulo Burte in the night of 14/07 and fired also a mortar round. After both sides exchanged gun-fire for around an hour, al Shabaab fighters retreated. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Ethiopian and al Shabaab forces engage in an hour-long battle near Wajid. Ten al Shabaab fighter believed killed in the fighting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an ENDF convoy, which was travelling between Tayeeglow and Ceel Garas in Ceel Gudo (20 KM NW of Tayeeglow) in the morning of 16/07. Reports indicate that 4 al Shabaab fighters were killed while four others were caught alive. ENDF casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an ENDF/SNG convoy near Idale (58 KM SW of Baidoa) in the evening of 19/07. Both sides exchanged small arms fire before al Shabaab fighters retreated. Two SNGF are reported to be killed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked an ENDF/SNGF convoy in Eesow, (approx. 49 KM east of Diinsoor) in the afternoon of 19/07. After a brief exchange of gun-fire, al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF and al Shabaab clash in Ceel Cilaan. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: An IED was hidden in the bush at the road side in Ceel Cilaan village (46km NW of Diinsoor) and exploded as ENDF engineering team were searching the area for explosives on 20/07 injuring 6 ENDF soldiers. After the explosion al Shabaab fighters engaged in small arms fire with ENDF resulting in the death of 2 al Shabaab fighters and one taken alive.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Police Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an ENDF convoy in Buur Dhuxunley (60 KM SE of Yeed) on 20/07. Unconfirmed reports indicate that there were al Shabaab and civilian casualties but the exact number is unknown. Additional reports add that ENDF were supported by Lieui police during the fight.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF took over the control of Rama Caddey (50 KM SW of Diinsoor) in the afternoon of 20/07. Both sides exchanged gun-fire before al Shabaab fighters withdrew from the village. No causalities reported from either sides.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF on security operation took over Moro Gabey (28 KM NW of Hudur) and Garas Weyne (47 KM NW of Hudur) in the afternoon of 20/07. In both villages ENDF/SNGF were confronted by al Shabaab fighters but 'no serious fighting' was reported before the allied forces took over the villages. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF on security operation took over Moro Gabey (28 KM NW of Hudur) and Garas Weyne (47 KM NW of Hudur) in the afternoon of 20/07. In both villages ENDF/SNGF were confronted by al Shabaab fighters but 'no serious fighting' was reported before the allied forces took over the villages. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM/SNGF convoy in Raamacadey (approx. 80 KM SW of Baidoa on 21/07. Serious fighting broke out between the two parties until al Shabaab forces withdrew. AMISOM/SNGF is still in the location in the morning of 22/07. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF and al Shabaab clash in Ceel Cilaan for a third consecutive day. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM/SNA convoy in the vicinity of Buufow Bacaad (5km NW of Marka) in the morning of 21/07. Two civilian bystanders were reportedly injured during the gunfire exchange.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM-SNG forces battle al Shabaab in several areas of Xudur district, overtaking Mura-gabe, Garas-wayne and Lagalay. Seventeen al Shabaab deaths reported among the three areas. One soldier died during the operation.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM-SNG forces battle al Shabaab in several areas of Xudur district, overtaking Mura-gabe, Garas-wayne and Lagalay. Seventeen al Shabaab deaths reported among the three areas.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM-SNG forces battle al Shabaab in several areas of Xudur district, overtaking Mura-gabe, Garas-wayne and Lagalay. Seventeen al Shabaab deaths reported among the three areas.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF took over Wabxo (50 KM NW of Bulo Burte) from an unknown power on 22/07. Exact details and number of casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF took over Muqakoor (67 KM NE of Bulo Burte) from an unknown or unreported power on 22/07. Exact details and number of casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF attacked Siji village (approx. 67 KM SE of Yeed on 22/07. After an exchange of gun fire, al Shabaab fighter withdrew from the village. Four al Shabaab fighters were killed and no other casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF/Lieu Police took over Labaatan Jirow (48 KM NE of Baidoa) after an armed confrontation in the outskirts of the village. Four al Shabaab fighters are said to have been killed. It is not known if the forces are planning to stay in the village or will move to another village.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Unconfirmed reports indicate that ENDF forces clashed with al Shabaab fighters and former al Shabaab Baidoa district court chairman was killed in Buur Dhuxunle (59 KM SE of Yeed)

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNA convoy was ambushed between Buufow Bacaad and Shalaambood (Marka District) in the morning of 24/07. Both sides engaged in a serious exchange of gunfire after which the attackers disappeared. Casualties of both sides are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Around twenty al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM/SNGF base in Muqakoor village (67 KM NE of Bulo Burte) early morning of 25/07. After a brief exchange of gun-fire, al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Joint ENDF/SNGF took over Ufurow (18 KM SW of Qansax Dheere) in the morning of 25/07. It is the second time in two weeks that Ufurow is changing hands as ENDF/SNGF after taking over small villages are leaving usually after 2 days again. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF forces shot and injured two Leysan militia men in Caragaduud (13 KM west of Baidoa) after mistaken them for al Shabaab fighters on 27/07. The injured men were brought to Baidoa hospital for further treatment.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF on security patrol went on Baad Cade Road (north of Baidoa) in the early morning of 27/07 to follow up on complains of illegal check-points set up by armed men dressed in military uniforms with the aim to rob civilians. On arrival, two of the present uniformed men at the illegal check-point were shot and killed while a third one was wounded after a short clash.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: 'Dozens' of al Shabaab are killed in Jameco area just 20 kilometres west of Burhakaba in Bay region. AMISOM-ENDF was also able to overtake the town. Date not clear.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_2: ONLA: Ogaden National Liberation Army
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF on military operation attacked Madaa village (25 KM SE of Tayeeglow) in the morning of 29/07. Al Shabaab/ONLF militia and ENDF/SNGF engaged in a prolonged fight before Al Shabaab/ONLF fled from the village, being persuaded by ENDF/SNGF. First information indicates that six al Shabaab fighters, five ONLF militias were killed in the attack and one al Shabaab fighters was captured alive. ENDF/SNAF also captured one PKM, four RPGs and some other small arms fire and ammunitions. It is not clear if the ENDF gained control of the village.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF attacked Siji village (approx. 40 KM SE of Rabdhure) on 29/07. Both sides engaged in a pro-longed gun battle until al Shabaab forces were forced to retreat. Six al Shabaab fighters were killed and their bodies displayed in the village. No other casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ISWA military and ENDF attacked Jameecadi Habardooy (11 KM SE of Baidoa) on 29/07. Both sides engaged in a gun battle which lasted more than 30 minutes before al Shabaab retreated into the bush. The armed clash was followed by an ENDF helicopter air bombing of the area. So far no casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF launched an ambush against al Shabaab fighters close to Buur Cadey (37 KM SE of Rabdhure) on 29/07. Reports indicate that four al Shabaab fighters have been killed in the armed clash and no casualties were reported from the allied forces side.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM-ENDF forces overtake Ceel Dheer from al Shabaab following an offensive on the town. Eleven reported deaths combatant dead, plus one civilian.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM-ENDF/SNG take over Warxoolo after an hour-long battle with al Shabaab. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Fighting broke out between al Shabaab and ENDF/SNGF in Faan-weyn village (46 SE of Garbaharey) on 05/08. Two al Shabaab fighters were killed while two others were arrested before al Shabaab withdrew.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF helicopters bombarded areas in between Nuur Fanaax (42 KM SW of Beled Weyne), Ceel LahCeele (41 KM SE of Beled Weyne District) and Booco (55 KM NW of Bulo Burte) after heavy al Shabaab movement and armed engagement was reported in the area on 06/08. Al Shabaab claimed two ENDF personnel carriers were destroyed and 35 allied soldiers were killed, though these numbers were not confirmed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks an AMISOM-Ethiopian convoy in the Nur Farax area of Beled Weyne. Seven dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF attacked al Shabaab in Yaabal Shallow village (approx. 23 KM SW of Xudur) on 08/08. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: SNFG/ENDF attacked al Shabaab fighters in Misra village (9 KM SE of Diinsoor town) on 11/08. The fighting continued for several hours before al Shabaab retreated. Fatalities are unknown, several injuries reports and ENDF took over the village.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab claim they have targeted and killed an Ethiopian commander in Miisra on 14/08. The report has not been confirmed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF on military operation clashed with al Shabaab fighters in Samataro (57 KM NW of Bulo Burte) on 16/08. After an exchange of gun-fire, al Shabaab fighters withdrew. One al Shabaab fighter was killed while casualties on the allied forces side are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Militiamen hailing from Dhulbahante/Reer Abokor clashed with Ethiopian soldiers near Buuhoodle along the border on 16/08 following after the Ethiopian forces attempted to arrest their kinsman. The two sides exchanged heavy gunfire after which the Ethiopian forces retreated back. Three ENDF injuries reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Heavy fighting between ENDF and al Shabaab is reported in the area between Raangaabo (33 KM SW of Belet Weyn) and Buqcagable (25 KM NW of Bulo Burte), near Luuqjelow, on 17/08 and still on-going on 18/08. Information are difficult to obtain but rumours indicate that there a lot of casualties (Radio Mogadishu reports 30). One unconfirmed report indicates that also the al Shabaab head of Ceel Cade (55 KM west of Belet Weyn) was killed in the fight together with other al Shabaab commanders.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Heavy fighting between ENDF and al Shabaab is reported in the area between Raangaabo (33 KM SW of Belet Weyn) and Buqcagable (25 KM NW of Bulo Burte) on 17/08 and still on-going on 18/08. Information are difficult to obtain but rumours indicate that there a lot of casualties. One unconfirmed report indicates that also the al Shabaab head of Ceel Cade (55 KM west of Belet Weyn) was killed in the fight together with other al Shabaab commanders.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: SNGF with support from ENDF and Lieue police attacked an al Shabaab base in Ceel Boon (41 KM SE of Luuq) in the morning of 18/08. Both sides exchanged gunfire for about 1 hour but casualties could not be established. It was reported by Somali-language Universal TV that SNGF, ENDF forces overtook the base and 11 al Shabaab fighters were killed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against ENDF/SNGF base in Muqakoori (67 KM SW of Bulo Burte) on 20/08. The exchange of gun fire lasted around half an hour before attackers withdrew, No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against ENDF/LP/SNGF base in Ceel Boon (41 KM SE of Luuq) in the night of 20/08. Both sides exchanged gun-fire before attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters and ENDF/LP/SNGF clashed in Lafmarket (approx. 35 KM SE of Luuq) on 20/08/2015. Lafmarket is on the road between Luuq and Ceel Boon (41 KM SE of Luuq) in a hilly area. After fierce fighting allied forces were first pushed back but received reinforcement from Wajiid. 40 al Shabaab, 10 government forces dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against ENDF/SNGF base in Tre Cento (31 KM SE of Beled Weyne) on 24/08. Both sides briefly exchanged gun-fire and no casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked a SNGF/ENDF military base in Qodaxey in the outskirts of Garbahaarey on 24/08. Four Combatants from both sides have been killed and more were injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF forces came under attack by al Shabaab forces at Bur Daar. According to bystanders, Al-Shabaab fighters began shelling an Ethiopian military base, which led to hand-to-hand combat. The extent of casualties caused by the attack remains unclear. Two soldiers captured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against ENDF/SNGF base in Diinsoor in the night of 25/08. After a brief exchange of gun-fire, attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported. The Somali and ISWA presidents are visiting Diinsoor on 26/08.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Police Forces of Ethiopia (1991-2018) Liyu Police
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters and END Liyu Police paramilitaries clashed in Qoond Hood (46 KM NE of Garbahaarey). After heavy fighting the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties from both sides are unknown so far.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed SNGF in Ceel Cilan (46 KM NW of Diinsoor) on 27/08. Al Shabaab fighters withdrew after an ENDF convoy was rushing to SNGF support. ENDF were searching the area after the fight and discovered an IED. ENDF/SNGF tried to detonate the device safely but it exploded, injuring one ENDF soldier seriously. No other casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against SNGF/ENDF base in Xabaalo Barbar (70 KM SW of Baidoa) in the evening of 28/08. Both sides exchanged heavy gun fire before al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Unconfirmed reports indicate that around 11 al Shabaab fighters were killed and four soldiers from the allied forces.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Two hand grenades were thrown against AMISOM soldiers in Beyterus neighbourhood of Marka on 29/08. AMISOM opened fire in the direction of the assault. A number of people were arrested by AMISOM but figures or casualties are unknown so far.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces retake Xabaalo Barbar after a series of successive attacks. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Allied Forces entered Halgan (41 KM north of Bulo Burte) in the morning of 31/08. An IED exploded at a former al Shabaab position in town causing no casualties. Allied forces were targeted with three IEDs on their way from Garasiyaani and Halgan on 30/08 killing one ENDF and injuring four others.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF on military operation clashed with al Shabaab fighters in Garasiyaani (55 KM NW of Bulo Burte) on 30/08. Both sides exchanged heavy weapons fire and an unconfirmed number of casualties on both sides are reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Allied Forces re-entered Halgan (41 KM north of Bulo Burte) in the morning of 31/08, gaining its control. An IED exploded at a former al Shabaab position in town causing no casualties. Allied forces were targeted with three IEDs on their way from Garasiyaani and Halgan on 30/08 killing one ENDF and injuring four others.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a complex attack against AMISOM base in Janaale Town (13 KM NW of Marka) on 01/09. The attack was opened with a massive SVBIED explosion, followed by intense gun-battle. The base is manned by Ugandan AMISOM contingent and reports indicate that al Shabaab took over the base and many AMISOM casualties are reported, later believed to be numbering 50.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM reinforcement coming from Shalam Bood and heading to Janaale was targeted with a RCIED in Buufow Bacaad (5 KM NW of Marka) on 01/09. Al Shabaab fighters immediately attacked the convoy after the explosion and fighting is on-going. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked a KDF/SNGF base in Ceel Gadde (51 KM SW of Garbahaarey) on 01/09. Both sides used heave weapons before al Shabaab fighters withdrew; Casualties on both sides are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of France (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks an AMISOM position in Janaale, 13 reported dead including a French officer.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against an AMISOM convoy travelling from Belet Weyne before Garasiyaani village (55 KM NW of Bulo Burte) on 06/09. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An AMISOM convoy heading to Baidoa was targeted with a RCIED in Iidow Jallad (approx. 60 KM SE of Buur Hakaba) on 06/09/2015. AMISOM exchanged gun-fire with the unidentified perpetrators but no casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked SNGF in Moro Gabey (28 KM NW of Xudur) after ENDF troops left. Al Shabaab took over the village after an armed clash, which injured 2 civilians in cross-fire. SNGF retreated to Xudur base.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unknown perpetrators throw a hand grenade against AMISOM on foot patrol around the police station in Baytaruus neighbourhood on 07/09/2015. AMISOM opened gunfire in all direction and three civilian bystanders were injured by the gun-fire. No casualties on AMISOM side and the perpetrators managed to escape.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM convoy was targeted with a RCIED in Kali-Caafimaad (20 KM NE of Marka) on 09/09. AMISIOM soldiers opened gun-fire in all directions. Reports indicate that one Caspir was damaged and some civilians were injured in the gun-fire.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked Ethiopian and Somali forces at Buush Madiino locality, just outside Baydhabo. Causality details not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked SNG and AU forces near Towfiiq junction. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked an AMISOM-Djibouti convoy between Buuloburde and Buurweyn, destroying two military vehicles and causing several unnumbered deaths.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and run attack against ENDF/SNFG military base north west of the town near the previous police station 0n 17/09. Both sides exchanged automatic machine gun fire, causalities from the fighting is not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy on the road from Yaaq Biri Weyne to Leego (approx. 30Km W of Wanla Weyne), exchanging gunfire for about 20min. No casualties reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy around Iidow Jallad (approx. 59 KM SE of Buur Hakaba) on 18/09. The convoy was travelling to Leego. After exchange of gun-fire, the convoy was able to proceed. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
