NOTES: SNFG/ENDF military security patrolling coincidentally came cross and immediately started fighting and exchanged Automatic gun fire in Gurbaan (60 KM SW of Diinsoor). Reports from residents in the village confirm that 11 al Shabaab fighters and 4 SNGF died in the fighting.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against SNG/AMISOM/ENDF forces based in Diinsoor in the night of 21/09. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly but no casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Burundi)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked Burundian-AMISOM forces in the Fiidow area. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNAF convoy heading from Bulo Burte to Belet Weyne was ambushed by suspected al Shabaab in Qaraalyaan (57Km NW of Bulo Burte). The two sides exchanged gunfire for about two hours, after which al Shabaab withdrew. Four al Shabaab fighters were reported dead, whereas no information on casualties was available on AMISOM/SNAF side.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: SNG/AMISOM forces took over Labaatan Jirow Village (48km SW of Baidoa) on 23/09 after the allied forces launched ground assault with aerial support from AMISOM/ENDF forces in which SNG military officials claim to have killed at least 10 al Shabaab fighters and destroyed three vehicles.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit-and-run attack against ISWA/SNFG/ENDF forces in Goof Gaduud Village (Baidoa District) on the night of 26/09. The two sides exchanged gunfire after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No causalities were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked AMISOM base in the outskirts of Marka with mortars in the night of 06/10. AMISOM forces responded with artillery and mortars which lasted for more than thirty minutes. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed ENDF convoy heading to Qansax Dheer with rocket propelled grenades in Ceel Cilaan (46km W of Diinsoor) in the afternoon of 07/10. The fighting lasted for two hours in which two ENDF military vehicles were reportedly burnt and unconfirmed reports indicate that both sides suffered unspecified number of casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF forces on two helicopters clashed with al Shabaab fighters who were planning to execute two men on suspicion of spying in Habar Dooy Village (27km SW of Baidoa) in the morning of 07/10. Local villagers gathered to witness the execution. Al Shabaab fighters clashed with ENDF who were dropped by the helicopters after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Reports indicate that 20 al Shabaab fighters were captured in the operation and taken to Baidoa. No reported causalities.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked ENDF and SNG forces manning a checkpoint in Baardheere in the morning of 07/10. The two sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. Ten casualties were later reported (Somali Memo). SNG forces conducte

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: SNFG/ENDF forces engaged in heavy fighting with al Shabaab fighters in Buulo Cadey (69km SW of Diinsoor) in the morning of 08/10. Unconfirmed reports indicate that both sides suffered unnumbered casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED was targeted against AMISOM convoy outside of Gol-Weyn town (22km SW of Marka) in the afternoon of 09/10. There was an armed clash between al Shabaab fighters and the AMISOM convoy immediately after the RCIED attack. Al Shabaab fighters withdrew from the scene after few minutes of exchange of gunfire. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed ENDF convoy coming from Qansax Dheere and heading to Buurdhuubo military base on 11/10. The ambush was followed by an IED explosion and reports indicate that both sides suffered an unspecified number of casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF on a joint security operation raided Ceel-Shiil village (4km SW of Ceel Buur) on 11/10 following a tip-off about al Shabaab fighters presence in the village. The operation followed an armed clash, which lasted for around 20 minutes after which an al Shabaab commander called Ali Yusuf aka 'Ali Ganey' was arrested and taken for further interrogation. The rest of other al Shabaab fighters fled the village. No other casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNG forces launched a new offensive against al Shabaab hideouts along the coast line between Mogadishu and Marka in the morning of 13/10. The allied forces briefly clashed with al Shabaab fighters and managed to take-over Gandarshe, Jilib-Marka and Dhanaane. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNG forces launched a new offensive against al Shabaab hideouts along the coast line between Mogadishu and Marka in the morning of 13/10. The allied forces briefly clashed with al Shabaab fighters and managed to take-over Gandarshe, Jilib-Marka and Dhanaane. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNG forces launched a new offensive against al Shabaab hideouts along the coast line between Mogadishu and Marka in the morning of 13/10. The allied forces briefly clashed with al Shabaab fighters and managed to take-over Gandarshe, Jilib-Marka and Dhanaane. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a hand grenade against AMISOM/SNA forces in the vicinity of Ruusiya neighbourhood (Marka) in the afternoon of 15/10. AMISOM reacted with gunfire. Two civilians were killed and four others injured in the shooting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Following the abduction of a teacher in Kenya several days ago, KDF rescues her in Somalia following a gun battle with al Shabaab, presumably somewhere in Lower Jubba. One of the abductors was killed in the operation, another arrested.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shaba attacks and destroys an AMISOM lorry outside of Cambarey on 16/10. 'Deaths and injuries' reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks two Ethiopian bases in Luuq District, capturing them briefly. Causalities not reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of the United States (2009-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/KDF contingent allegedly supported by American forces (the latter, presumably from the air) launched a military offensive against al Shabaab fighters as part of 'Jubaland Corridor Offensive' near Yoontoy Yarey village (25km NE of Kismaayo) in the afternoon of 25/10. Reports indicate that the operation destroyed a boat used by al Shabaab fighters to cross river Juba. At least 15 al Shabaab fighters and a local man, reportedly the owner of the boat were killed during the raid. Further reports suggest that there were also air strikes on the eastern side of the river Juba near Yoontoy Yarey village. No casualties were reported as a result of the air strikes. In later sources indicated AMISOM forces had gained control of the area.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: ENDF/SNGF on security operation were ambushed in Golweyn (31 KM SW of Luuq) on 26/10. The ambush was initiated by an IED explosion, followed by heavy gun-fire, using PKM, RPGs and AK 47 weapons. First reports indicate that one of the ENDF was killed and two were wounded while two SNGF were wounded during the fight. On the other hand four al Shabaab fighters were killed, five injured while two others captured. Radio Al-Furqaan reports 13 dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks AMISOM Kenya forces in Badhaadhe on the evening 26/10, inflicting 'huge losses.'

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNG forces attacked an al Shabaab base in Qoleyle Village (20km S of Luuq) in the early morning of 27/10. AMISOM/SNG forces took over the village after several hours of fighting. Five combatants from both sides were killed and eight others were injured.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attack the resident of a senior al Shabaab commander in Ufurow, engage in fighting which resulted in death and injury, numbers not known. Ethiopian forces were also involved.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked an ENDF military base in the outskirts Qansax-Dheere town in the night of 31/10. Reports indicate the attack started with motor fire targeting the base followed by exchange of gunfire from both sides which lasted about an ho

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: A mini-bus loaded with explosives detonated at the main gate of Sahafi Hotel (Wadajir/Medina District) in the morning of 01/11 with unidentified number of al Shabaab gunmen storming the hotel as they exchanged gunfire with the security guards. A suicide bomber detonated a second set of explosive inside the hotel about 30 minutes later. NISAs especial operation unit called Gaashaan was deployed to the scene to battle with the militants. The siege lasted for more than four hours after which the AMISOM/SNG forces concluded the operation. The hotel is often frequented by Somali government officials, business executives and it has been also targeted before where two French security advisers were abducted from the hotel by al Shabaab fighters back in 2009. At least 15 people were killed (later estimated at 25), including the owner of the hotel, a parliamentarian and the attackers while score others were injured. Al Shabaab fighters immediately claimed responsibility for the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters reportedly ambushed AMISOM convoy near Garasiyaani (Beled Weyne District) in the afternoon of 03/11. The convoy was going towards Beled Weyne when the incident happened. Casualties remain unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: SNFG/ENDF/KDF carried out an attack against an al Shabaab base in Jungal Village (22km NW of Baardheere) in the morning of 07/11. The operation follows after al Shabaab fighters forcefully took livestock as Zakat from the nomads in the area. Unconfirmed reports indicate that nine al Shabaab fighters were killed in the clash.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED was targeted against AMISOM convoy near Ex-Control Balcad (Heliwa District) in the evening of 09/11. The blast reportedly destroyed one of the AMISOMs vehicles. AMISOM forces responded with gunfire. An unknown number of AMISOM soldiers were reportedly killed in the explosion while a civilian bystander was injured in the shooting.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushed Ugandan forces outside Bulo Mareer on 12/11. The Ugandans suffered casualties, but no further details were immediately available.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM/SNA convoy in the vicinity of Gol-Weyn Village (21km SW of Marka) in the afternoon of 16/11. Both sides exchanged heavy gunfire which lasted more than an hour. The convoy was reportedly heading towards Baraawe when the incident happened. Somali Memo reports 12 AMISOM deaths, including a commander.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: SNG/ENDF forces attacked a group of al Shabaab fighters who were forcing local pastoralists to pay Zakat in the outskirts of Qansax Dheere in the midnight of 17/11. One al Shabaab fighters was killed and his gun confiscated while another was injured. Further reports indicate that another fighter was also arrested by the forces and traditional elders from his sub-clan are advocating for his release.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: RCIED was targeted against AMISOM convoy in the vicinity of Baar Jowhar (Heliwa District) in the evening of 22/11. The device reportedly caused no damage. AMISOM troops opened gunfire after the blast but no casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out an attack against AMISOM/SNG forces based in Arbacow village in Afgooye district in the night of 24/11. The two sides briefly exchanged gunfire after which the al Shabaab attackers withdraw. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNG forces launched an attack against al Shabaab fighters position in Carshaanley Village (13km SW of Baraawe District) in the morning of 27/11. The two sides exchanged fire after which the allied forces took over the control of the village. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM/SNG forces convoy near Golweyn Village (21km SW of Marka District) in the afternoon of 27/11. The two sides exchanged gunfire after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base at the former Jaale Siyaad Military Academy (Hodan District) in the night of 27/11. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: At least five people were killed and nine others injured on 28/11 in a heavy fighting between Somali National Army backed by the African Union peacekeeping forces (AMISOM) and Al-Shabaab militants in Barawo town.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked SNG/ENDF base at Bardheere airstrip on the mid night of 28/11. Reports indicate that al Shabaab fighters initiated the attack with several rounds of mortars before engaging in a direct confrontation with the allied forces. Th

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces shot and killed a unidentified militiaman near Marka Police Station in the morning of 02/12. The incident happened after the AMISOM forces suspected the victim of attacking their compound.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed SNA forces in the vicinity of Baar Village (Beled Weyne District) on 04/12. The two sides engaged in a serious exchange of gunfire for more than an hour. Reports indicate that ENDF supported the SNA during the clash. SNA commanders claimed that they had killed 10 al Shabaab fighters including a foreign fighter.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED was targeted at an AMISOM convoy in the vicinity of Bali Doogle Airport (Wanla Weyne District) in the afternoon of 05/12. The explosion reportedly destroyed one of the AMISOM vehicles. AMISOM forces responded with gunfire after the blast. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed ENDF/AMISOM convoy in Mooda-Mooda Village (29km SE of Baidoa) in the afternoon of 07/12. The convoy left Mogadishu and was heading to Baidoa when the incident happened. Both sides exchanged gunfire for about 30 minutes. Casualties could not be confirmed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM base in Mudul-Braawe (5km NW of Baraawe) in the night of 07/12. Both sides exchanged gunfire for about 30 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks AMISOM-Uganda bases in an around Baraawe, including in Ambareso village. Any causalities were left unreported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attack an AMISOM-Uganda convoy in Bulo Mareer, no causalities reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM forces based in Ceelasha (12km E of Afgooye District) in the night of 09/12. The fighting lasted for about thirty minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF and al Shabaab forces clash during the evening hours in Baardheere. Al Shabaab propaganda stated ENDF 'suffered greatly.'

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack an AMISOM-ENDF convoy on the outskirts of Beled Weyne on 18/12. The attack began with a landmine explosion, which hit an armoured vehicle carrying Ethiopian soldiers. It is confirmed that the explosion has completely destroyed the vehicle on the spot. 'Death and injuries' reported, no numbers provided.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: A RCIED was targeted against AMISOM convoy in Gol-Weyn town (22km W of Marka) in the afternoon of 18/12. The explosion was followed by armed confrontation between the AMISOM forces and al Shabaab attackers. The exchange of gunfire lasted for few minutes after which the attackers withdrew. AMISOM forces in Gol-Weyn later opened gunfire against a public mini-bus which was moving along the road and killed five passengers on spot in retaliation for the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit and run attack against AMISOM/SNGF base in Buur Dhuxunle (33km SE of Rabdhure) early morning of 20/12. Al Shabaab was firing small arms against the position and immediately retreated. AMISOM/SNGF did not respond. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM/SNGF convoy travelling outside Qoryole (18km SE of Jalalaqsi) in the morning of 20/12. Al Shabaab hit the convoy but immediately withdrew into the bush. Two SNGF were killed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attack AMISOM-Djibouti forces on Jalalaqsi on 20/12, killing three.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: AMISOM-Kenyan and Jubaland forces oust al Shabaab from Beexaani following a air strike and clash. Somali Memo disputes the claim of retreat. No reported casualties. Date of final clash not clear, though came following an air strike on 23/12 - source dated 25/12.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Suspected al Shaabab fighters attacked an AMISOM/SNGF base in Taraka Village (49km SW of Baardheere) in the morning of 29/12. Reports indicate that around six SNGF were killed while the casualties on the attackers side is unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: IED explosion targeted AMISOM/ENDF convoy in Leego (48km SE of Buur Hakaba) in the afternoon of 04/01. The explosion was followed by a brief armed clash which lasted for 30 minutes. Causalities could not be confirmed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM-Somali forces overtake Towfiq village near the central town of Galad during a military offensive in the area. Causalities, if any, were left unreported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters conducted a hit and run attack against AMISOM/KDF contingent base in Badhaadhe town on 09/01.The sides briefly clashed for about 10 minutes after the attackers withdrew. The Kenya Daily reported the SNG forces reported with gunfire, killing 19 of the attackers.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attacked against AMISOM/KDF contingent base in Kolbiyow Village (38km SW of Badhaadhe) in the evening of 13/01.The clash lasted for about 15 minutes and both sides used light weapons before the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: Al Shabaab
ACTOR2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters raided a private house in Alwileh, Beled Xawo District (approx. 25km NW of Ceel Cadde), killing the owner of the house and allegedly four KDF soldiers who seek sanctuary in the house after the Ceel Cadde attack on 17/01. No other casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An IED targeted AMISOM convoy on the road between Bulo Mareer and Gol-Weyn villages (28& 21km respectively) in the morning of 19/01 followed by an ambush from suspected al Shabaab fighters. AMISOM forces after a short brief of armed clash repulse the attackers. Casualties unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters attacked an ENDF convoy near Lanta Garaski (approx. 15km N of Waajid on 20/01. Attackers fired small arms fire against the convoy and escaped. ENDF continued with their journey to Buurdhuxunle. No reported causalities.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Two people have been killed after Al-Shabaab fighters ambushed an African Union army convoy which later resulted in heavy fighting near the southern Somalia town of Buulo Mareer.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed and attacked an ENDF convoy heading from Xudur to Tayeelow in Shiida Village (26km NE of Xudur) on 25/01. Attackers fired small arms and RPGs against the convoy but retreated immediately after ENDF/ISWA forces responded. No casualties were reported but one hut caught fire in the village after being hit by a round of RPG.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Burundi)
NOTES: Unidentified attackers hurled a hand grenade against AMISOM (Burundians) base inside Kabka compound (Hodan District) in the evening of 26/01. The AMISOM forces responded with gunfire after the attack. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM troops on foot patrol near Gol-Weyn Village (22km SW of Marka) in the morning of 03/02. Both sides exchanged gunfire before the al Shabaab fighters retreated. Pro-al Shabaab website claimed that six Ugandans were killed in that attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushed AMISOM-KDF contingent with three RCIED explosions in a sequence and fired with small guns at Jeldesa area of Tabta Village neighbourhood (aaprox 55 KM SW of Afmadow town) on 03/02 afternoon. No human casualties reported and no property damaged, the explosions missed the target according to reports from the residents and travellers who got caught up in the ambush.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF faced an ambush at Yoontoy Yarey Village neighbourhood (25KM NE of Kismaayo) which turned into a heavy clash that lasted for 2hrs, both sides used heavy machine guns, mortars and artillery then al Shabaab withdrew. No human casualties or property damaged as residents report.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Biyamal Clan Militia (Somalia)
NOTES: AMISOM and Biyamal attack al Shabaab location in Marka a day following the sect gaining control of the city. Causalities not known, though the clash caused a large displacement of the area population.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Danow (Marka District) in the night of 07/02. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Qoryooley on 08/02. The fighting lasted for a few minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM/SNG convoy in Gol-Weyn Village (22km SW of Marka) in the evening of 17/02. The ambush was followed by fierce armed clash between the two sides which lasted for about twenty minutes after which the al Shabaab attackers retreated. Three civilians were injured by stray bullets.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Heavily armed al Shabaab fighters' ambushed AMISOM/SNG forces convoy near Yaaq Biri Weyne (22km W of Wanla Weyne) in the morning of 22/02. The attack started with a RCIED attack which destroyed an oil tanker followed by gunfire which lasted for hours while part of the convoy managed to reach Leego later in the afternoon. Four vehicles were destroyed and eleven combatants from both sides were killed in the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack a group of Ugandian soldiers delivering supplies to Baidoa. Casualties reported, exact figures not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces ambushed a group of AMISOM-Ethiopia forces at Leego on 22/02. The attack destroyed one of the vehicles in the convoy. No causalities.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM convoy near Qurac-Madoobe (22km NE of Jowhar Town) in the afternoon of 24/02. Both sides exchanged in a gunfire for some time after which the AMISOM convoy managed to proceed its journey. The convoy came from Ceel-Baraf and was heading to Mahadaay when the incident happened. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an ambush against ENDF/SNFG convoy travelling from Leego to Baidoa in the afternoon of 25/02 in Daynuunay Village (18km SW of Baidoa). AMISOM convoy was attacked several times and so far four casualties were reported on ENDF/SNGF side.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed an ENDF convoy travelling from Wajiid to Buur Dhuxunley in Lanta Gasarta Village (pprox.16 KM N of Waajid) on 26/02. After exchange of gun-fire, the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: The African Union Mission in Somalia (AMISOM), supported by the Somali troops, killed at least ten Al-Shabaab militants and injured 20 others near Somalias southwestern town of Hudur on 26/02.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched an attack against AMISOM/SNA forces in Buufow Bacaad Village (5km NW of Marka town) in the afternoon of 27/02. These forces were deployed in Buufow Bacaad to receive a convoy from Mogadishu. Both sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the al Shabaab fighters retreated to Janaale direction. According to locals, al Shabaab brought injuries in Janaale. The exchange of gunfire also caused the death of number of goats which were caught in the crossfire. No specific report of human fatality.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An IED exploded prematurely near Tabta (75km SW of Afmadow) in the afternoon of 28/02. AMISOM forces in the area responded with heavy gun fire in the direction of the explosion. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNAG forces clashed with al Shabaab fighters near Biyo-Cado Village (36km NE of Jowhar) in the morning of 28/02. Both sides exchanged heavy and light weapons during the clash after which AMISOM/SNG forces overpowered the al Shabaab fighters. Two combatants from both sides were confirmed dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Qoryooley town on 29/02. The fighting lasted for almost an hour. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a brief hit and run attack against an ENDF convoy in Safar-Nooley (15km SE of Diinsoor) on 03/03. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy near Gol-Weyn Village (22km W of Marka) in the afternoon of 05/03. Both sides exchanged different types of gunfire during the clash. The AMISOM convoy came from Mogadishu and was heading to Baraawe when the incident happened. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Ceel-Baraf Village (55km NE of Jowhar) on 05/03 night. The fighting reportedly lasted for thirty minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties cannot be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks government forces location near Baraawe town during the nighttime hours. The fighters attacked the SNA base with rocket propelled grenade launchers and machine guns before they were repulsed by the coalition forces comprising of AU and Somali troops. No reported causalities.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Mudul-Brawe (5km NE of Baraawe) in the night of 06/03. After brief exchange of gunfire the attackers retreated. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM and SNG forces, bases in Qoryooley in the night of 07/03. The fighting lasted for about 30 minutes after which the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNG forces launched an attack against al Shabaab fighters in Miir-Taqwo (53km NE of Jowhar) in the morning of 10/03. Heavy fighting followed where both sides exchanged different types of weapons. Two combatants from both sides were killed in the clash.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: An al Shabaab assault on a AMISOM-KDF camp in Afmadow on 15/03 causes 19 al Shabaab dead following the Kenyan response.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushes a Kenyan convoy at Kolbiyow, destroying the vehicle and killing eight.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Ceel-Baraf (55km NE of Jowhar) in the night of 18/03. Both sides exchanged gunfire for almost twenty minutes after which the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked AMISOM-KDF logistic convoy contingent heading to Afmadow and started with an IED detonation followed by heavy exchange of gun fire at Abaya Bilow grazing area near Xaya Village (about 45km SW from Afmadow Town) on 19/02 afternoon. The attack lasted more than three hours and both sides have exchanged small and heavy arms fire. One APC and one big truck (lorry-loaded with assorted items) were heavily damaged by the IED and RBP fire. Two helicopters reached the location later for rescue reasons and over three hundred JLF forces from Afmadow and Dhoobley were also brought in and the convoy spent the night at the point where the ambush happened. Two JLF and seven others from AMISOM soldiers were reportedly killed, two JLF soldiers and ten AMISOM soldiers were injured. Agence France Presse claims 21 dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces base in Ceelasha (12km SE of Afgooye) in the night of 26/03. Both sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers retreated. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM forces base in Mudul-Brawe (5km NW of Baraawe) in the night of 27/03. The fighting lasted for twenty minutes after which the al Shabaab attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched hit-and-run attack against SNG and AMISOM forces' bases in Qoryooley town in the night of 28/03. Both sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which the attackers withdrew. Unconfirmed number of al Shabaab fighters were injured in the clashes.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: SNA/AMISOM forces conducted a security operation against al Shabaab fighters in Laanti-Garaska Village (60km SE of Waajid Town) in the morning of 29/03. Reports indicate that both sides exchanged gunfire briefly after which al Shabaab fighters withdrew from the area. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy in the outskirts of Ceel Lalelay (35km SE of Dhusamareeb) on 31/03. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed a convoy of AMISOM and local militias near Janaale Village (14km NW of Marka) in the morning of 31/03. The exchange of gunfire lasted more than 30 minutes. The allied forces left from Buufow Bacaad and were heading towards Janaale when the incident happened. Casualties are unknown but two helicopters landed in Shalaambood and reportedly evacuated a number of injured UPDF soldiers.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNA forces and al Shabaab fighters engaged in an armed clash near Janaale (14km NW of Marka) in the morning of 01/04. AMISOM and SNA forces left from Buufow Bacaad and moved closer to Janaale when al Shabaab fighters ambushed the allied forces on their way to Janaale. AMISOM/SNA forces went back to their positions in the afternoon. Casualties from both sides are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: At least three KDF fighter jets supported by ground troops attacked al-Shabab bases in Berhani. Two al Shabaab fighters killed, others captured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM/ENDF convoy in Ulajarad (21km SE of Ceel Buur) in the morning of 05/04. Both sides used light and heavy weapons during the fighting. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed SNA/ENDF convoy in the outskirts of Adan Yabaal Town in the afternoon of 05/04. The two sides exchanged gunfire for about an hour after which the al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Pro-al Shabaab website claimed that they destroyed two vehicles from ENDF. Al Shabaab fighters left the town while the allied forces are stationed in the outskirts of the town and the residents are fleeing their homes in fear of armed confrontations between the two sides.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: A landmine targeted an AMISOM/ENDF convoy in the outskirt of Nuur Fanax (42km SE of Belet Weyn) in the morning of 06/04, destroying a water tanker. The forces responded with gunfire. Later they received reinforcement from troops based in Halgan village (41km NW of Bulo Burte), these forces stayed overnight at the scene while helicopters landed at the location, probably to medevac the injured. No reported fatalities.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM/ENDF and SNG forces jointly conducted a security operation in Laanta Garaska Village (60km SE of Waajid) in the afternoon of 06/04. The joint forces briefly clashed with al Shabaab fighters, who then retreated from the area. Reports indicate that both sides suffered fatalities and injuries but exact numbers are currently unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy near Qurac-Madoobe (23km NE of Jowhar) in the morning of 06/04. Following the ambush a brief armed clash occurred, but the convoy managed to proceed on its trip. The forces were heading to Biyo-Cado when the ambush happened. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against a AMISOM-ENDF/SNA base in the northern outskirt of Adan Yabaal town on the night of 06/04. Both sides used different types of weapons including RPGs before the attackers withdrew. Casualties are unknown. AMISOM forces had recently peacefully gained control of Adan Yabaal.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNA forces launched an attack against al Shabaab fighters in Jacar and Derri (41 & 40km S/SE of Ceel Buur) in the morning of 07/04. The allied forces engaged the al Shabaab fighters controlling the two villages and managed to take both of both over. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM/SNA forces launched an attack against al Shabaab fighters in Jacar and Derri (41 & 40km S/SE of Ceel Buur) in the morning of 07/04. The allied forces engaged the al Shabaab fighters controlling the two villages and managed to take both of both over. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attack a ENDF convoy outside of Halgan on 07/04, killing at least two. The battle began with a land mine explosion followed by an assault. At the time of the report the fighting was ongoing.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against AMISOM base in Ceel-Baraf in the night of 08/04. The fighting lasted for more than 30 minutes and both sides exchanged different types of weapons during the fight. casualties from both sides remain unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_2: Murusade Clan Militia (Somalia)
NOTES: ENDF clashed with al Shabaab and Murusade militia in Baraagta Hasan Yeber, Ceel Buur District, source dated 09/04. Al Shabaab claimed 50 ENDF dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Local media reported heavy fighting between AMISOM/SNA and al Shabaab fighters in Ulajarad (21km SE of Ceel Buur) on 10/04. The SNA commander in Ceel Buur zone stated that they killed about 12 al Shabaab fighters in the fighting, a claim which could not be independently verified. It is not clear who initiated the fighting at this stage.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked Gol-Weyn (22 KM SW of Marka) on 15/04/2016. The fighting took more than two hours, both sides using heavy weaponry. Unconfirmed information indicates that six AMISOM soldiers were killed and one was taken alive by al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM (unknown Djibouti or Ethiopia), SNG and Galmudug security forces clashed with al Shabaab fighters in Ulajarad village (21km SE of Ceel Buur) in the morning of 20/04. A source known as Goobjoog reported 25 dead.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Troops of Somalia and the AMISOM killed at least three members of al Shabaab and injured four others in an operation in the Bakool villages of Warcaddoy, Goobad and Gumuro. The joint forces gained control of all three areas.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Troops of Somalia and the AMISOM killed at least three members of al Shabaab and injured four others in an operation in the Bakool villages of Warcaddoy, Goobad and Gumuro. The joint forces gained control of all three areas.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Troops of Somalia and the AMISOM killed at least three members of al Shabaab and injured four others in an operation in the Bakool villages of Warcaddoy, Goobad and Gumuro. The joint forces gained control of all three areas.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: An AMISOM convoy, travelling from Shalaambood (10 KM NW of Marka) to Ceel Jaale (6 KM NW of Marka) were hit by a suspected al Shabaab road-side bomb. Villagers reported a gun-fight after the explosion but casualties are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched an attack against AMISOM base in Buulo Sheekh (5 KM SE of Qoryoley) in the night of 23/04. Casualties cannot be confirmed at this stage.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launched an attack against AMISOM base in the outskirts of Qoryoley in the night of 23/04. Casualties cannot be confirmed at this stage.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab propaganda reports an attack on AMISOM-ENDF and SNG forces at Diinsoor on 24/04. The attack resulted in a 'ferocious' fighting, causalities not reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM Military camp in Buulo Mareer (28 KM SW of Marka) on 24/04. Al Shabaab fighters attacked the camp from several directions. al Shabaab fighters retreated, causalities from both sides are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab propaganda reports an attack on AMISOM-ENDF in Waajid district on 24/04, causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: An unidentified attacker hurled a hand grenade against AMISOM soldiers on foot patrol near Qoryooley Bridge in the evening of 26/04. The forces opened fire in all directions in response to the blast. Three SNG soldiers and a civilian bystander were injured by the blast. The attacker managed to escape.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: AMISOM/KDF and Jubaland security forces jointly launched an offensive operation against a fortified al Shabaab checkpoint in Abdale Birole Village (41km SW of Kismaayo) in the morning of 26/04. The allied forces overran & destroyed it and took control of the village after a brief armed clash. Following the takeover, the Jubaland forces torched an al Shabaab shelter next to the checkpoint. Later the Jubaland forces met with clan elders and discussed the security situation in the area. No casualties were reported from either side.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: SNG and ASMISOM forces overtake the Shabeellaha Dhexe areas of Runir-god, Nur-dugle and Ad-adey. Though the forces were met with resistance, there were no reported causalities.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: SNG and ASMISOM forces overtake the Shabeellaha Dhexe areas of Runir-god, Nur-dugle and Ad-adey. Though the forces were met with resistance, there were no reported causalities.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Galmudug Administration; Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Joint AMISOM/SNG/Galmudug forces re-took Galcad village (65km NW of Ceel Dheer) from al Shabaab on 30/04. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: At least two Al-Shabaab militants were killed and two government soldiers injured after the insurgents attacked a local administrator of Bardhere town in Gedo region. AMISOM-ENDF were also involved.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit and run attack against AMISOM base in Buufow Bacaad (5km NW of Marka) in the night of 11/05. The fighting lasted for about 20 minutes. Casualties from both sides could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against a AMISOM position in Mudul Baraawe (5km NW of Baraawe) in the night of 11/05. The fighting lasted for about twenty minutes after which the attackers retreated. Casualties were not reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and Somali forces attack al Shabaab positions in Mareerey. 'Heavy fighting' reported, though no report as to the number of causalities.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks Kenyan AMISOM forces at Tabta on 12/05. Al Shabaab claims a 'number of [Kenyan] dead.'

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM forces in Waajid district attack and overtake an al Shabaab base at el-Malable area on 13/05. Nine dead reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab retreated from several positions in Shabeellaha Dhexe on 13/05, following 'heavy military onslaught' from AMISOM and SNG forces in the region. No specific towns or villages were named by the source. Causalities unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM and Somali forces clash in Buulobarde on 14/05. Five al Shabaab dead, as well as one civilian.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked a military base in Halgan village in Hiiran region on the night of 15/05, but were repulsed by African Union Mission in Somalia (AMISOM) and Somali forces. No causalities yet confirmed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attack AMISOM and SNG forces in Maxaas, causing 'casualties of death and injuries on both sides of the fighting.'

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Somalia's Special Commandos (Danab) and AMISOM Forces, supported a raid of an al Shabaab base in Bariire (27km SW of Afgooye) by American forces in the morning of 16/05. The allied forces were reportedly using helicopters to drop the troops at K50 in a nearby village and heavy fighting ensued. Local residents confirmed that SNA Commandos entered the town while al Shabaab fighters pulled out. Suspected American helicopters conducted an airstrike against retreating al Shabaab fighters. Somalia Army officials said that they released prisoners from the village and captured several al Shabaab fighters. The joint forces reportedly stayed two hours, then left. The exact reasons behind the raid are unclear. The number of casualties remains unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters fired mortar rounds against a ENDF/SNGF base in Baardheere airport, in the evening of 16/05. After the shelling, the two sides briefly exchanged gunfire before al Shabaab fighters withdrew. Casualties from the shelling and the subsequent armed clash could not be established.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a hit-and-run attack against an AMISOM base in Mudul Baraawe (5km NW of Baraawe) in the night of 17/05. Both sides exchanged gunfire briefly before the attackers withdrew. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack, and briefly overtake Hosingow village from Kenyan and Jubaland forces. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks an AMISOM base in Qoryooley the evening of 23/05. The battle that followed caused casualties, though the numbers of dead and wounded are not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces ambushed a SNG and AMISOM-KDF convoy near Dhobley on 24/05, 25 al Shabaab killed, including a junior commander.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushes a convoy of AMISOM-ENDF soldiers in Lagaley on 26/05, leading to gun battle of more of three hours. Al-Shabaab officials have claimed through their media that they have killed around 30 soldiers and destroyed military trucks, though these numbers have not been verified.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and SNG forces, supported by aircraft, carry out a raid on Toratorow, dislodging al Shabaab from the village. The fighters left the town soon after and al Shabaab in turn filled the void. At least two al Shabaab killed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM and ISWA forces clash in Buur Xakaba over control of a checkpoint. No casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambush a group of AMISOM-ENDF forces in Qansax Dheere on 29/05. The figure of casualties from the two fighting sides cannot yet be verified, though fatalities are implied by the source.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launches a two day, overnight siege on the Ambassador Hotel in Mogadishu, killing fifteen, including two members of Parliament. Forty others injured. The two elected officials had duel British citizenship. AMISOM forces responded, killing all attackers, numbers not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launches a two day, overnight siege on the Ambassador Hotel in Mogadishu, killing fifteen, including two members of Parliament. Forty others injured. The two elected officials had duel British citizenship. AMISOM forces responded, killing all attackers, numbers not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters attacked AMISOM troops based at Bufow-Bacaad settlement (c. 4 km North West of Merka town). The exchange of gunfire involved the use of RPGs and heavy guns and al Shabaab were finally forced to withdraw. AMISOM started shelling al Shabaab suspected frontlines after al Shabaab withdrew. There were no reports of casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab carried out large-scale attack on Ethiopian bases in Waajid district in Bakool region. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: An al Shabaab car-bombing and subsequent raid allegedly kills more than 60 AMISOM-ENDF soldiers when it detonated at a Halgan military base on 09/06. The Sudan Tribune reported the deaths of 248 al Shabaab, which the Ethiopian government later verified, but denied they had lost the 60 claimed by al Shabaab, but did not provide additional numbers. Somali government soldiers were also involved in the counter-attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: On the 9 June, al Shabaab militants launched an attack against an AMISOM (DJAF contingent) base in Western Bulo Burto. The attack lasted about 30 minutes and there were no reports of casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and run attack against AMISOM KDF position in Tabta village (c. 60 km East of Dhobley). There were no reports of casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces carried out attack on the 'Christian troops of Kenya' station at Tabta area. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: On 10 June, al Shabaab fighters conducted an ambush attack on an ENDF convoy at Wabxa. The confrontation lasted for 30 minutes and nine al Shabaab fighters were reportedly killed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM-ENDF and al Shabaab forces clash in Ceel Cali on 10/06. Al Shabaab backed media reports add that the attack inflicted 'fatal casualties on the Ethiopian troops.'

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: An RCIED targeting an AMISOM convoy moving from Mogadishu heading towards Shalamboot at Buufow - Bacad area in Merka District exploded. One AMISOM lorry was hit and damaged by the blast. AMISOM soldiers reacted with gunfire towards suspected directions. Initial report indicated that one AMISOM soldier was killed while two others were injured.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: An RCIED targeting an AMISOM Convoy moving from Afgoye and heading towards number 50km exploded at Adow Dibile vicinity (08km West of Afgoye district). One AMISOM truck was damaged by the explosion as eyewitness confirmed. One soldier killed in the blast. Following the blast several soldiers pursued the fleeing attackers, killing two.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces carry out fierce attack on Ethiopian forces defences in Waajid district. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: At least seven militants were killed and five others arrested in heavy fighting between Somali National Army backed by the African Union peacekeeping forces and Al-Shabaab late on Friday in Barowe town in Lower Shabelle region. Al Shabaab claims 10 AMISOM dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: According to reports from locals at Albeet area approx. 17 km W of Husungo, al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM KDF convoy travelling from Dhobley to Hosungo at Albeet. There was a brief exchange of gun fire before al Shabaab retreated from the scene. No casualties reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed AMISOM/SNA forces near Kurtun (approx. 30kms NE of Qansax-Dheere), prompting a brief exchange of gunfire. Al Shabaab fighters retreated from the area. AMISOM forces discovered and safely removed IEDs on the road after the incident. The convoy reportedly proceeded to Baidoa the next morning.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and run attack against AMISOM KDF/JLF position at Hosungo village (approx. 90 km SE Dhobley). Reportedly al Shabaab fighters directed small arms fire towards the AMISOM/JLF position from a distance. The joint forces responded, and al Shabaab fighters retreated from the area. No casualties reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Two vehicles, a pickup truck and a cargo vehicle were burned, and tens of Ethiopian soldiers killed after a [al Shabaab] surprise attack and a roadside bomb explosion along the road linking Elbuur and Dhuusamareeb districts.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces carried out an attack on Ethiopian forces convoy in Ceel Lahelay in Galgaduud. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attack Kenyan forces base in Hoosingow area. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Two vehicles were burned and a number of Ethiopian forces were either killed or wounded following an al Shabaab ambush along the road linking Huddur and Ceelbarde in Bay and Bakool regions.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: An al Shabaab-planted IED destroys a vehicle in an AMISOM convoy near Mahadaay, causalities not immediately known. AU troops clashed with Al Shabab fighters shortly after explosion, causalities equally unknown in the subsequent clash. Sources said AMISOM soldiers have indiscriminately opened fire on a nearby civilians, killing a cattle herder and wounded four others after the Al Shabab militants ambush attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters carried out a probing attack against ENDF/ISWA forces in Tiyeeglow district (Approx. 90kms SE of Xudur). Al Shabaab fired small arms fire from a distance towards the ENDF/ISWA position in the town and retreated from the area. ENDF/ISWA forced did not respond. No casualty was reported from the incident.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM forces clash with al Shabaab, retake Goof Guduud. Two al Shabaab dead.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017) Jubaland Security Force
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Jubaland Darwish forces with AMISOM troops conducted security operation against al Shabaab suspected position outside Kismayo. The joint forces reportedly reached Singaler/Wirkoy area (approx. 35kms NW of Kismayo). AS fighters and anti-AS forces briefly exchanged gunfire near the said locations. AS fighters reportedly retreated from the area and no casualty was reported from the incident.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Suspected al Shabaab militants carried out an ambush attack against AMISOM Convoy at Dabayodle Village approx. 30km North East of Jowhar District. The exchange of heavy gunfire lasted for about one hour before attackers were repelled. No reports of casualties.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: At least one person has been killed and several others wounded in fighting between Somali government forces backed by Ethiopian troops that are part of AMISOM [African Unions Mission in Somalia] troops and al-Shabab movement in the town of Galhareeri, Galguduud Region.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: A group of al Shabaab fighters carried out a hit and run attack against the AMISOM base at Mudul Barawe neighbourhood in Barawe district. Both sides exchanged heavy gunfire for about 15 minutes after which al Shabaab militants retreated. No casualties were reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters reportedly ambushed an AMISOM (KDF Contingent) convoy heading to Kulbiyow at Ali Wali area (approx. 8kms SW of Kulbiyo, the borderline between Kenya and Somali). The convoy was reportedly heading to Kulbiyo village. An explosion initiated the ambush followed by an armed clash between the two sides. One KDF military truck was reportedly damaged by the explosion. Casualties from the incident are unknown.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters reportedly fired a number of RPG rounds combined with small arms fire against AMISOM (ENDF Contingent) convoy near Beer Xaano village (approx. 30kms S of Beledweyne town). AMISOM forces reportedly responded with heavy weapons and small arms fire. No casualty was reported. Al Shabaab fighters reportedly escaped from the area.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Unidentified gunmen suspected to be al Shabaab fighters carried out an ambush attack against an AMISOM Convoy at El Baraf village, 30Km NE of Mahaday town. The exchange of gunfire lasted for about 20 minutes before al Shabelle fighters were repelled. No report of casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: AMISOM (Djiboutian) forces in an attempt to clear an illegal checkpoint in Liiqliiqato Bridge, Hawlwadag neighbourhood of Western Beledweyne exchanged gunfire with clan militias at the checkpoint. The clan militias set up the checkpoint during the last incident of armed clash in that part of the town. AMISOM forces are reportedly at the location. No casualty was reported from the incident.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces and 'local militia' exchange fire after AMISOM attempted to dismantle illegal roadblocks in Belet Weyne. The clash caused 'loss of life.' Other sources refer to the actors as 'Somali soldiers.'

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: At least 14 Somali civilians were killed and three others wounded following a shooting between Ethiopian troops and al-Shabab fighters in War Diinle. Witnesses claim the ENDF forces opened fire indiscriminately on the civilians following the clash. No reported dead among the combatants.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ACTOR2: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Djibouti)
NOTES: AMISOM/Djibouti forces clash with SNA forces during an attempted arrest of the latter. An SNA soldier was reported dead. Following the clash local residents demonstrated, condemning the incident.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: ENDF (Leyu Police) clashed with a group of Ogaden National Liberation Front (ONLF) members near Mataban (c. 70 km North East of Beletweyne). Eight ONLF members were killed and four others were captured. ASWJ in Mataban captured one ONLF militias who was transferred to Leyu Police. ONLF members were headed to the Ethiopia-Somali border at the time of the incident.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Unidentified armed men, suspected to be al Shabaab militants, carried out a hit and run attack at AMISOM base at Danow (c. 16 km North West of Merka District). There was an exchange of gunfire which lasted for about 30 minutes after which the attackers were repelled. There were no reports of casualties.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Somali National Forces (SNA), backed by African Union Mission in Somalia (AMISOM) troops, killed three Al-Shabaab militants during a security operation in Jubba region in southern Somalia on Thursday at Buurkoy location.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab have launched a massive attack on African Union forces base at El-Jalle area, near Marka city. At least one death reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: At least 13 people were killed when two vehicles packed with explosives went off as they were driven towards a base for African Union troops in the Somali capital. The base is near a UN office. Al Shabaab later claimed responsibility asserting 27 dead. One of the bombers was later learned to be a former MP.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: An RCIED targeting an AMISOM troop convoy detonated along Idow Jalaad road in Leego village (c. 30 km North West of Walaweyne District). The convoy was moving from Leego to Mogadishu. There was an exchange of gunfire which lasted for about 15 minutes. Five people including Leego town District Commissioner, namely Abukar Abdullahi Al-Adala, who accompanied the AMISOM convoy died, four AMISOM soldiers were injured and one AMISOM truck was damaged by the explosion. The perpetrators managed to escape. Al Shabaab claimed responsibility of the attack.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Two Ugandan soldiers were injured and eight Somali nationals killed in an early morning car-bombing attack on the African Union forces base in Halane, Madiina.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Burundi)
NOTES: Al Shabaab militants carried out a hit and run attack against Burundian troops based at Arbacow vicinity (c. 15 km West of Mogadishu in Afgoye District). The attack was initiated by the firing of RPGs targeting AMISOM base followed by heavy exchange of gunfire which lasted for about 30 minutes after which al Shabaab militants withdrew. There were no reports of casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Burundi)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters have launched a coordinated assault on a military base belonging to African Union mission in Somalia (AMISOM) located in the outskirts of Mogadishu on 26/07 night. Reports say Al Shabaab militants attacked the military base, which is run by Burundian troops who are part of the AMISOM near Elasha Biyaha, 18Km southwest of Mogadishu with mortars. Details of the casualties unclear.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of the United States (2009-2017)
NOTES: US and African Union forces attacked the town of Awdhiigley (Awdheegle) where they faced resistance. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Government forces backed by AMISOM-ENDF clash with al Shabaab at Moro Gabey. Five deaths reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: AMISOM and al Shabaab forces clash in Abacow, near Afgooye. Al Shabaab were soon repelled following 25 minutes of gunfire and shelling. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked an AMISOM/SNG base in Qoryooley, causing a battle that lasted about 30 minutes. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab launches an attack on AMISOM and SNG forces in Hudur on 11/08. At least three SNG soldiers reported killed.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attack AMISOM and SNG soldiers near Baraawe. Casualties could not be established.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Somali National Army (SNA) backed by Africa Union peacekeeping mission (AMISOM) on Monday captured four locations near Bardhere town: Matano, Anole, Tubako and Qutaley. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Somali National Army (SNA) backed by Africa Union peacekeeping mission (AMISOM) on Monday captured four locations near Bardhere town: Matano, Anole, Tubako and Qutaley. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Somali National Army (SNA) backed by Africa Union peacekeeping mission (AMISOM) on Monday captured four locations near Bardhere town: Matano, Anole, Tubako and Qutaley. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Somali National Army (SNA) backed by Africa Union peacekeeping mission (AMISOM) on Monday captured four locations near Bardhere town: Matano, Anole, Tubako and Qutaley. Casualties not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks AMISOM/SNG forces at Qoryooley. No reports of casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Burundi)
NOTES: Al Shabaab has fired mortar rounds on Burundian peacekeepers military base at Elasha Biyaha area, about 18 kilometers south-west of Mogadishu on Friday mid-night. The overnight mortar attack has sparked a fierce gunfight between Al Shabaab fighters and Burundian soldiers who are serving under the African Union mission in Somalia (AMISOM). There was no immediate report of casualties.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: African Union Mission in Somalia (AMISOM) forces backed by Somalia National Army on Friday killed four Al-Shabaab militants during a security operation in Bula-gudud area in southern Somalia.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Burundi)
NOTES: Al Shabaab carried out an attack on AMISOM-Burundi forces at El-Arbao village near Afgooye. Al Shabaab were repelled after a 30 minute gunfight. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: AMISOM forces kill eight members of al Shabaab in Baidoa on 22/08.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Police Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Somali and AMISOM police forces clash with SNG forces in Dharkenley after the soldiers refused to drop their weapons when ordered. Three injuries reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM and SNG forces clash with al Shabaab in Wardhabaale and Luuqjeelow. AMISOM were able to overtake the areas following a gunfight. However, al Shabaab regained control of the areas after the government allied forces left the area later in the day. Three soldiers reported injuries.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM and SNG forces clash with al Shabaab in Wardhabaale and Luuqjeelow. AMISOM were able to overtake the areas following a gunfight. However, al Shabaab regained control of the areas after the government allied forces left the area later in the day. Three soldiers reported injuries.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked an AMISOM base in Budbud. After heavy fighting al Shabaab was eventually pushed back. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: The Somali army, backed by the African Union peacekeeping troops, killed at least seven Al-Shabaab militants on 27/08 in a fighting at Surayo location, about 15km from Burdhubo town in the southern Somali region of Gedo

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attacked a ENDF convoy in Hinshilow, near Rab Dhuure. A civilian was killed by a stray bullet.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab forces attacked ENDF soldiers in Buur Dhuxunle prompting a clash. No reported causality.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushed an AMISOM convoy between Danow and Bula-Mare. AMISOM responded with gunfire. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Somali and AMISOM forces attack an al Shabaab position in Berdale. No reported causalities.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Uganda)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked a group of Ugandan forces at K60 village in Afgooyle district. Scores of AMISOM forces reported killed by al Shabaab.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attack a AMISOM position in Qoryooley District, leading to a long gun battle. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: The African Union (AU) peacekeeping troops backed by Somali National Army (SNA) captured Abdale Birole from al Shabaab on 08/09. No casualties from AU/SNA side. Al Shabaab casualties not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and SNAF forces launched an operation in Awdheegle killing a local al Shabaab official.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: AMISOM and SNG forces clash with al Shabaab in Goob Weyn, 25 al Shabaab reported dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: AMISOM forces capture Kiunga location near Goob Weyn from al Shabaab. Eight al Shabaab reported dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: AMISOM forces launch an operation against al Shabaab in Buulo Gaduud. No reported causalities.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
NOTES: Somali government troops, with the support of AU soldiers have launched an offensive on Busley town which is under the control of Al Shabaab. Following a clash, government and allied forces dislodge al Shabaab. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked an AMISOM convoy at Wabxo causing an exchange of gunfire. Causalties not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab and ENDF forces clash between Ceel Buur and Wabho. Causalties not known.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Kenya)
NOTES: Two al-Shabaab fighters have been killed after Somali forces supported by African Union troops launched attack on Monday in the outskirt Somalias southern city port of Kismayo.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-) (Ethiopia)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacked an AMISOM ENDF contingent in Lamo Warood, leading to a gun battle. Two al Shabaab reported dead.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters ambushed an AMISOM convoy in the vicinity of Mahadaay (22km NE of Jowhar) on 05/10. The ambush started with a RCIED explosion followed by direct confrontation. Local residents reported that AMISOM forces opened fire after the explosion and that there were casualties among both AMISOM and civilians - number not reported.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks AMISOM forces in Qoryooley. The fighting comprised of shelling and direct attack. Heavy causalities 'possible.'

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab fighters launched a raid on African Union forces military outpost in El Baraf area in Middle Shabelle region, south of Somalia on Thursday. Causalities not known.

ACTOR1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab ambushed an AMISOM convoy in Golweyn, causing retaliation. One civilian bystander was killed and five others wounded.

ACTOR1: Military Forces of Somalia (2012-2017)
ASSOC_ACTOR_1: AMISOM: African Union Mission in Somalia (2007-)
NOTES: Al Shabaab attacks Afgooye killing 10, including soldiers and civilians. The attackers also suffered casualties. The attack began with a car-bombing, which was followed by an assault.
